original: suddhantaparivāso nāma.
analyzed: suddhantaparivāsaḥ nāma

original: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto

original: pakkhamānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī; evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
analyzed: pakkham ānattam khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhumānattakathāya vuttanayeneva saṅghassa
analyzed: kamma vācā pariyosāne vattam samādiyitvā bhikkhum ānatta kathāya vutta nayena iva saṅghassa

original: ārocetvā nikkhittavattaṃ vasitukāmāya tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu
analyzed: ārocetvā nikkhitta vattam vasitu kāmāya tattha iva saṅgha majjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu

original: ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike vuttanayeneva nikkhipitabbaṃ. Aññissā pana
analyzed: eka bhikkhuniyāḥ vā dutiyikāya vā santike vutta nayena iva nikkhipitabbam aññissā pana

original: āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne
analyzed: āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbam nikkhitta kālataḥ paṭṭhāya pakatatta ṭṭhāne

original: tiṭṭhati. Puna samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpentiyā pana bhikkhunīnaṃyeva santike vasituṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭhati puna samādiyitvā aruṇam uṭṭhāpentiyā pana bhikkhunīnam yeva santike vasitum

original: na labhati. “Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā assā ācariyupajjhāyāhi
analyzed: na labhati ubhato saṅghe pakkha mānattam caritabbanti hi vuttam tasmai assā ācariya upajjhāyāhi

original: vihāraṃ gantvā saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito eko mahāthero vā dhammakathiko vā bhikkhu vattabbo
analyzed: vihāram gantvā saṅgāhaka pakkhe ṭhitaḥ ekaḥ mahā theraḥ vā dhamma kathikaḥ vā bhikkhu vattabbaḥ

original: – “ekissā bhikkhuniyā vinayakammaṃ kattabbamatthi, tatra no ayyā, cattāro bhikkhū
analyzed: ekissā bhikkhuniyāḥ vinaya kammam kattabbam atthi tatra no ayyā cattāro bhikkhū

original: pesethā”ti. Saṅgahaṃ akātuṃ na labbhati, pesessāmīti vattabbaṃ. Catūhi pakatattabhikkhunīhi
analyzed: pesetha iti saṅgaham a kātum na labbhati pesessāmi iti vattabbam catūhi pakatatta bhikkhunīhi

original: mānattacāriniṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā antoaruṇeyeva nikkhamitvā gāmūpacārato dve leḍḍupāte
analyzed: mānatta cārinim bhikkhunim gahetvā antoaruṇeya iva nikkhamitvā gāmūpacārataḥ dve leḍḍupāte

original: atikkamitvā maggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Vihārūpacāratopi
analyzed: atikkamitvā maggā okkamma gumbavati ādīhi paṭicchanna ṭṭhāne nisīditabbam vihāra upacārataḥ pi

original: dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā catūhi pakatattabhikkhūhipi tattha gantabbaṃ. Gantvā
analyzed: dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbā catūhi pakatatta bhikkhūhi pi tattha gantabbam gantvā

original: pana bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ, paṭikkamitvā avidūraṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pana bhikkhunīhi saddhim na eka ṭṭhāne nisīditabbam paṭikkamitvā avidūra ṭṭhāne nisīditabbam

original: Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana “bhikkhunīhipi byattaṃ ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsikāyo bhikkhūhipi
analyzed: kurundi mahāpaccarīsu pana bhikkhunīhi pi byattam ekam vā dve vā upāsikāyaḥ bhikkhūhi pi

original: ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsake attarakkhaṇatthāya gahetvā gantabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kurundiyaṃyeva
analyzed: ekam vā dve vā upāsake atta rakkhaṇa tthāya gahetvā gantabbanti vuttam kurundiyam yeva

original: ca bhikkhunupassayassa ca vihārassa ca upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ, gāmassāti na vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ca bhikkhun upassayassa ca vihārassa ca upacāram muñcitum vaṭṭati iti vuttam gāmassa ati na vuttam

original: Evaṃ nisinnesu pana bhikkhūsu ca bhikkhunīsu ca tāya bhikkhuniyā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunīsaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
analyzed: evam nisinnesu pana bhikkhūsu ca bhikkhunīsu ca tāya bhikkhuniyāḥ mānattam samādiyāmi vattam samādiyāmi iti vattam samādiyitvā bhikkhunī saṅghassa tāva evam ārocetabbam

original: “Ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ gāmantaraṃ, sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya
analyzed: aham ayye ekam āpattim āpajjim gām antaram sā aham saṅgham ekissā āpattiyā gām antarāya

original: pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ
analyzed: pakkha mānattam yācim tassa me saṅghaḥ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkha mānattam

original: adāsi, sāhaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ carāmi, ‘vedayāmahaṃ, ayye, vedayatī’ti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti.
analyzed: adāsi sā aham pakkham ānattam carāmi vedayāmaham ayye vedayati iti mama saṅghaḥ dhāretu uti

original: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ – “ahaṃ, ayyā, ekaṃ āpattiṃ
analyzed: tatas bhikkhu saṅghassa santikam gantvā evam ārocetabbam aham ayyā ekam āpattim

original: āpajjiṃ …pe… vedayāmahaṃ, ayyā, vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti. Idhāpi yāya kāyaci
analyzed: āpajjim pe vedayāmaham ayyā vedayati iti mama saṅghaḥ dhāretu uti idha api yāya kāyacid

original: bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: bhāsāya ārocetum vaṭṭati

original: Ārocetvā ca bhikkhunisaṅghasseva santike nisīditabbaṃ, ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: ārocetvā ca bhikkhuni saṅghassa iva santike nisīditabbam ārocita kālataḥ paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnam

original: gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace sāsaṅkaṃ hoti, bhikkhuniyo tattheva ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti, ṭhātabbaṃ.
analyzed: gantum vaṭṭati sace sa āsaṅkam hoti bhikkhuniyo tattha eva ṭhānam paccāsīsanti ṭhātabbam

original: Sace añño bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ ṭhānaṃ eti, passantiyā ārocetabbaṃ. No ce āroceti,
analyzed: sace aññaḥ bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā tam ṭhānam eti passantiyā ārocetabbam no ce āroceti

original: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sace ajānantiyā eva upacāraṃ okkamitvā gacchati,
analyzed: ratti chedo ca iva vatta bheda dukkaṭam ca sace a jānantiyāḥ eva upacāram okkamitvā gacchati

original: ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Sace bhikkhuniyo upajjhāyādīnaṃ vattakaraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: ratti chedaḥ u va hoti na vatta bheda dukkaṭam sace bhikkhuniyaḥ upajjhāya ādīnam vatta karaṇa attham

original: pageva gantukāmā honti, rattivippavāsagaṇaohīyanagāmantarāpattirakkhaṇatthaṃ ekaṃ
analyzed: pagā iva gantu kāmāḥ honti ekam

original: bhikkhuniṃ ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Tāya aruṇe uṭṭhite tassā santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhunim ṭhapetvā gantabbam tāya aruṇe uṭṭhite tassā santike vattam nikkhipitabbam

original: Etenupāyena akhaṇḍā pañcadasa rattiyo mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
analyzed: etena upāyena akhaṇḍā pañcadasa rattiyaḥ mānattam caritabbam

original: Anikkhittavattāya pana pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
analyzed: a nikkhitta vattāya pana pārivāsika khandhake vutta nayena iva sammā vattitabbam ayam

original: pana viseso – “āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti ettha yattakā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ
analyzed: pana visesaḥ āgantukassa ārocetabbanti ettha yattakā purebhattam vā pacchābhattam

original: vā taṃ gāmaṃ bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā āgacchanti, sabbesaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentiyā
analyzed: vā tam gāmam bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyaḥ vā āgacchanti sabbesam ārocetabbam an ārocentiyā

original: ratticchedo ca vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sacepi rattiṃ koci bhikkhu taṃ gāmūpacāraṃ okkamitvā
analyzed: ratti chedo ca vatta bheda dukkaṭam ca sace pi rattim koci bhikkhu tam gāmūpacāram okkamitvā

original: gacchati, ratticchedo hotiyeva, ajānanapaccayā pana vattabhedato muccati. Kurundiādīsu
analyzed: gacchati ratti chedaḥ a jānana paccayā pana vatta bhedataḥ muccati kurundi ādīsu

original: pana anikkhittavattabhikkhūnaṃ vuttanayeneva kathetabbanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pārivāsikavattādīnaṃ
analyzed: pana anikkhitta vatta bhikkhūnam vutta nayena iva kathetabbam ti vuttam tam pārivāsika vatta ādīnam

original: upacārasīmāya paricchinnattā yuttataraṃ dissati. Uposathe ārocetabbaṃ, pavāraṇāya
analyzed: upacāra sīmāya paricchinna ttā yuttataram dissati uposathe ārocetabbam pavāraṇāya

original: ārocetabbaṃ, catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: ārocetabbam catunnam bhikkhūnam ca bhikkhunīnam ca devasikam ārocetabbam sace bhikkhūnam

original: tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati, tattheva gantabbaṃ. No ce sampajjati, aññatra
analyzed: tasmin gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati tattha iva gantabbam no ce sampajjati aññatra

original: caritvāpi tatra āgantvā attānaṃ dassetvā gantabbaṃ. Bahigāme vā saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ
analyzed: caritvā api tatra āgantvā attānam dassetvā gantabbam bahigāme vā saṅketa ṭṭhānam kātabbam

original: – “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne amhe passissasī”ti. Tāya saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ.
analyzed: asukasmin nāma ṭhāne amhe passissasi iti tāya saṅketa ṭṭhānam gantvā ārocetabbam

original: Saṅketaṭṭhāne adisvā vihāraṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Vihāre sabbabhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṅketa ṭṭhāne a disvā vihāram gantvā ārocetabbam vihāre sabba bhikkhūnam ārocetabbam

original: Sace sabbesaṃ sakkā na hoti ārocetuṃ, bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhatvā bhikkhuniyo pesetabbā.
analyzed: sace sabbesam sakkā na hoti ārocetum bahi upacāra sīmāya ṭhatvā bhikkhuniyo pesetabbā

original: Tāhi ānītānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Sace vihāro dūro hoti sāsaṅko, upāsake
analyzed: tāhi ānītānam catunnam bhikkhūnam ārocetabbam sace vihāraḥ dūraḥ hoti sa āsaṅkaḥ upāsake

original: ca upāsikāyo ca gahetvā gantabbaṃ. Sace pana ayaṃ ekā vasati, rattivippavāsaṃ āpajjati,
analyzed: ca upāsikāyo ca gahetvā gantabbam sace pana ayam ekā vasati ratti vippavāsam āpajjati

original: tasmāssā ekā pakatattā bhikkhunī sammannitvā dātabbā ekacchanne vasanatthāya.
analyzed: tasmā assā ekā pakata ttā bhikkhunī sammannitvā dātabbā eka channe vasana tthāya

original: Evaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ mānattaṃ caritvā vīsatigaṇe bhikkhunisaṅghe vuttanayeneva abbhānaṃ
analyzed: evam akhaṇḍam mānattam caritvā vīsati gaṇe bhikkhuni saṅghe vutta nayena iva abbhānam

original: kātabbaṃ. Sace mānattaṃ caramānā antarāpattiṃ āpajjati, mūlāya paṭikassitvā tassā
analyzed: kātabbam sace mānattam caramānā antarāpattim āpajjati mūlāya paṭikassitvā tassā

original: āpattiyā mānattaṃ dātabbanti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “pakkhamānattaṃ” nāma.
analyzed: āpattiyāḥ mānattam dātabban ti kurundiyam vuttam idam pakkha mānattam nāma

original: “Samodhānamānattaṃ” pana tividhaṃ hoti – odhānasamodhānaṃ, agghasamodhānaṃ, missakasamodhānanti.
analyzed: samodhānam ānattam pana tividham hoti  odhāna samodhānam aggha samodhānam missaka samodhānan ti

original: Tattha yadetaṃ parato udāyittherassa pañcāhapaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ parivasantassa
analyzed: tattha yat etam paratas udāyi ttherassa pañca aha paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsam parivasantassa

original: parivāse ca mānattārahaṭṭhāne ca antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā mūlāyapaṭikassitassa “tena
analyzed: parivāse ca mānatta arahaṭṭhāne ca antarāpattim āpajjitvā mūlāya paṭikassitassa tena

original: hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detū”ti
analyzed: hi bhikkhave saṅghaḥ udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannam āpattīnam chārattam mānattam detu uti

original: mānattaṃ anuññātaṃ, idaṃ “odhānasamodhānaṃ” nāma. Idañhi punappunaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanena
analyzed: mānattam anuññātam idam odhāna samodhānam nāma idam hi punappunam mūlāya paṭikassanena

original: parivutthadivase odhunitvā purimāpattīhi saddhiṃ samodhāya dinnaṃ, tasmā odhānasamodhānanti
analyzed: parivuttha divase odhunitvā purima āpattīhi saddhim samodhāya dinnam tasmai

original: vuccati. Kurundiyaṃ pana “samodhānaparivāsaṃ vutthassa dātabbaṃ mānattaṃ samodhānamānatta”nti
analyzed: vuccati kurundiyam pana samodhāna parivāsam vutthassa dātabbam mānattam samodhāna mānattanti

original: vuttaṃ. Tampi tena pariyāyena yujjati.
analyzed: vuttam tam pi tena pariyāyena yujjati

original: Agghasamodhānaṃ pana missakasamodhānañca agghasamodhānamissakasamodhānaparivāsāvasāne
analyzed: aggha samodhānam pana missaka samodhānam ca aggha samodhāna missaka samodhāna parivāsa avasāne

original: dātabbamānattameva vuccati, taṃ parivāsakammavācānusārena yojetvā dātabbaṃ. Ettāvatā
analyzed: dātabbam ānattam eva vuccati tam parivāsa kamma vācā anusārena yojetvā dātabbam ettāvatā

original: yaṃ vuttaṃ “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya
analyzed: yat vuttam tena hi bhikkhave saṅghaḥ udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya

original: sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ detūtiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ anekehi
analyzed: sukka vissaṭṭhiyai eka aha paṭicchannāya eka aha parivāsam detu iti ādinā nayena pāḷiyam anekehi

original: ākārehi parivāso ca mānattañca vuttaṃ, tassa yasmā āgatāgataṭhāne vinicchayo vuccamāno
analyzed: ākārehi parivāsaḥ ca mānattam ca vuttam tassa yasmai āgata āgata ṭhāne vinicchayaḥ vuccamānaḥ

original: pāḷi viya ativitthāraṃ āpajjati, na ca sakkā hoti sukhena pariggahetuṃ, tasmā naṃ
analyzed: ati vitthāram āpajjati na ca sakkā hoti sukhena pariggahetum tasmā naṃ

original: samodhānetvā idheva dassessāmā”ti, tadidaṃ atthato sampāditaṃ hoti.
analyzed: samodhānetvā idha iva dassessāma ati tat idam atthataḥ sampāditam hoti

original: Paṭicchannaparivāsakathā
analyzed: paṭicchanna parivāsa kathā

original: 102. Idāni yā tāva ayaṃ paṭicchannāya ekissā āpattiyā vasena pāḷi vuttā, sā uttānatthāva.
analyzed: idāni yā tāva ayam paṭicchannāya ekissā āpattiyā vasena vuttā sā uttāna tthā ava

original: 108. Tato paraṃ dvīhatīhacatūhapañcāhapaṭicchannānaṃ vasena pāḷiṃ vatvā pañcāhapaṭicchannāya
analyzed: tatas param vasena pāḷim vatvā pañcāha paṭicchannāya

original: parivāsato paṭṭhāya antarāpatti dassitā. Yasmā pana taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho
analyzed: parivāsataḥ paṭṭhāya antarāpatti dassitā yasmai pana tam āpattim āpannaḥ mūlāya paṭikassanā arahaḥ

original: nāma hoti, tasmāssa tattha mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Sace pana nikkhittavatto
analyzed: nāma hoti tasmā assa tattha mūlāya paṭikassanam anuññātam sace pana nikkhitta vatto

original: āpajjati, mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho na hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā na so parivasanto āpanno, pakatattaṭṭhāne
analyzed: āpajjati mūlāya paṭikassanā arahaḥ na hoti kasmai yasmai na saḥ parivasantaḥ āpanno pakatatta ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhito āpanno, tasmā tassā āpattiyā visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ. Sace paṭicchannā hoti
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ āpannaḥ tasmā tassā āpattiyāḥ visum mānattam caritabbam sace paṭicchannā hoti

original: parivāsopi vasitabbo. Yañcetaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmimpi kate parivutthadivasā
analyzed: parivāsaḥ api vasitabbaḥ yat ca itam mūlāya paṭikassanam vuttam tasmim pi kate parivuttha divasā

original: makkhitā honti. Iti parivāse antarāpattiṃ dassetvā puna mānattārahassa antarāpattiṃ
analyzed: makkhitāḥ honti iti parivāse antarāpattim dassetvā puna mānattā rahassa antarāpattim

original: dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmimpi kate parivutthadivasā makkhitāva honti.
analyzed: dassetvā mūlāya paṭikassanam vuttam tasmin pi kate parivuttha divasāḥ makkhitāḥ ava honti

original: Tato parivutthaparivāsassa tāsaṃ tissannampi āpattīnaṃ samodhānamānattaṃ dassitaṃ.
analyzed: tatas parivuttha parivāsassa tāsam tissannam pi āpattīnam samodhāna mānattam dassitam

original: Tato mānattacārikassa antarāpattiṃ dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana
analyzed: tatas mānatta cārikassa antarāpattim dassetvā mūlāya paṭikassanam vuttam tasmim pana

original: paṭikassane kate mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi parivutthadivasāpi makkhitāva honti. Tato abbhānārahassa
analyzed: paṭikassane kate mānatta ciṇṇa divasāḥ api parivuttha divasāḥ api makkhitāḥ ava honti tatas abbhānārahassa

original: antarāpattiṃ dassetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmimpi kate sabbe te makkhitāva
analyzed: antara āpattim dassetvā mūlāya paṭikassanam vuttam tasmin pi kate sabbe te makkhitāva

original: honti. Tato paraṃ sabbā antarāpattiyo yojetvā abbhānakammaṃ dassitaṃ. Evaṃ paṭicchannavāre
analyzed: honti tatas param sabbāḥ antarāpattiyaḥ yojetvā abbhāna kammam dassitam evam paṭicchanna vāre

original: ekāhapaṭicchannādivasena pañca, antarāpattivasena catassoti nava kammavācā dassitā honti.

original: 255. Pattahatthenāti ettha na kevalaṃ yassa patto hatthe, so eva pattahattho, na

original: 256. Namatakanti satthakaveṭhanakaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ. Daṇḍasatthakanti pipphalakaṃ vā aññampi vā yaṃkiñci daṇḍaṃ yojetvā katasatthakaṃ.

original: Kaṇṇakitā hontīti malaggahitā honti. Kiṇṇena pūretunti kiṇṇacuṇṇena pūretuṃ. Sattuyāti

original: Kathinaṃ nappahotīti dīghassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena kataṃ kathinaṃ; tattha rassassa

original: Bidalakanti daṇḍakathinappamāṇena kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: bidalakanti daṇḍa kathina ppamāṇena kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇa karaṇam

original: Salākanti dupaṭṭacīvarassa antare pavesanasalākaṃ. Vinandhanarajjunti mahānisseṇiyā
analyzed: salākam ti du paṭṭa cīvarassa antare pavesana salākam vinandhana rajjunti mahā nisseṇiyā

original: saddhiṃ khuddakaṃ nisseṇiṃ vinandhituṃ rajjuṃ. Vinandhanasuttanti khuddakanisseṇiyā
analyzed: saddhim khuddakam nisseṇim vinandhitum rajjum vinandhana suttanti khuddaka nisseṇiyā

original: cīvaraṃ vinandhituṃ suttakaṃ. Vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti tena suttakena tattha

original: cīvaraṃ vinandhitvā sibbituṃ. Visamā hontīti kāci khuddakā honti, kāci mahantā. Kaḷimbhakanti

original: Paṭiggahanti aṅgulikosakaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiggahanti aṅguli kosakam

original: veḷuṃ vā rukkhadaṇḍaṃ vā antokatvā tena saddhiṃ saṅgharitunti attho. Bandhanarajjunti

original: 258. Kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā kataṃ.
analyzed: kaṭacchuparissāvanam nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā katam

original: 259. Yo na dadeyyāti aparissāvanakasseva yo na dadāti, tassa āpatti. Yo pana attano
analyzed: yaḥ na dadeyyāti a parissāvanakassa iva yaḥ na dadāti tassa āpatti yaḥ pana attanaḥ

original: hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati, tassa na akāmā dātabbaṃ. Daṇḍaparissāvananti
analyzed: hatthe parissāvane vijjamāne api yācati tassa na akāmā dātabbam daṇḍa parissāvanam ti

original: rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya sāṭakaṃ bandhitvā
analyzed: rajakānam khāra parissāvanam viya catūsu pādesu baddha nisseṇikāya sāṭakam bandhitvā

original: majjhedaṇḍake udakaṃ āsiñcitabbaṃ, taṃ ubhopi koṭṭhāse pūretvā parissavati. Ottharakaṃ
analyzed: majjhedaṇḍake udakam āsiñcitabbam tam ubho pi koṭṭhāse pūretvā parissavati ottharakam

original: nāma yaṃ udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakaṃ gaṇhanti, tañhi catūsu daṇḍakesu vatthaṃ
analyzed: nāma yam udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakam gaṇhanti tat hi catūsu daṇḍakesu vattham

original: bandhitvā udake cattāro khāṇuke nikhaṇitvā tesu bandhitvā sabbapariyante udakato
analyzed: bandhitvā udake cattāraḥ khāṇuke nikhaṇitvā tesu bandhitvā sabba pariyante udakataḥ

original: mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti. Makasakuṭikāti cīvarakuṭikā vuccati.
analyzed: mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakam gaṇhanti makasa kuṭikā ati cīvara kuṭikā vuccati

original: 260. Abhisannakāyāti semhādidosussannakāyā. Aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma dvārabāhāya samappamāṇoyeva
analyzed: abhisanna kāyā iti semha ādi dosussanna kāyā aggaḷavaṭṭi nāma dvāra bāhāya

original: aggaḷatthambho vuccati, yattha tīṇi cattāri chiddāni katvā sūciyo denti. Kapisīsakaṃ
analyzed: aggaḷa tthambhaḥ vuccati yattha tīṇi cattāri chiddāni katvā sūciyaḥ denti kapi sīsakam

original: nāma dvārabāhaṃ vijjhitvā tattha pavesito aggaḷapāsako vuccati. Sūcikāti tattha majjhe
analyzed: nāma dvāra bāham vijjhitvā tattha pavesitaḥ aggaḷa pāsako vuccati sūcikā ati tattha majjhe

original: chiddaṃ katvā pavesitā. Ghaṭikāti upari yojitā. Maṇḍalikaṃ kātunti nīcavatthukaṃ
analyzed: chiddam katvā pavesitā ghaṭikā ati upari yojitā maṇḍalikam kātunti nīca vatthukam

original: cinituṃ. Dhūmanettanti dhūmanikkhamanachiddaṃ. Vāsetunti gandhena vāsetuṃ. Udakaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: cinitum dhūma nettam ti dhūma nikkhamana chiddam vāsetum ti gandhena vāsetum udaka ṭṭhānam ti

original: udakatthapanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha ghaṭena udakaṃ ṭhapetvā sarāvakena vaḷañjetabbaṃ. Koṭṭhakoti dvārakoṭṭhako.
analyzed: udakatthapana ṭṭhānam tattha ghaṭena udakam ṭhapetvā sa rāvakena vaḷañjetabbam koṭṭhako ti dvāra koṭṭhako

original: 261. Tisso paṭicchādiyoti ettha jantāgharapaṭicchādi ca udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ
analyzed: tisso ettha jantā ghara paṭicchādi ca udaka paṭicchādi ca parikammam

original: karontasseva vaṭṭati, sesesu abhivādanādīsu na vaṭṭati. Vatthapaṭicchādi sabbakammesu
analyzed: karontassa eva vaṭṭati sesesu abhivādana ādīsu na vaṭṭati vattha paṭicchādi sabba kammesu

original: vaṭṭati. Udakaṃ na hotīti nhānodakaṃ na hoti.
analyzed: vaṭṭati udakam na hoti iti nhānodakam na hoti

original: 262. Tulanti paṇṇikānaṃ viya udakaubbāhanakatulaṃ. Karakaṭako vuccati goṇe vā yojetvā
analyzed: tulanti paṇṇikānam viya udaka obbāhanaka tulam karakaṭakaḥ vuccati goṇe vā yojetvā

original: hatthehi vā gahetvā dīghavarattādīhi ākaḍḍhanayantaṃ. Cakkavaṭṭakanti arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ.
analyzed: hatthehi vā gahetvā dīgha vara tta ādīhi ākaḍḍhana yantam cakka vaṭṭa kanti arahaṭa ghaṭiyantam

original: Cammakhaṇḍaṃ nāma tulāya vā karakaṭake vā yojetabbakaṃ cammabhājanaṃ. Pākaṭā hotīti
analyzed: cammakhaṇḍam nāma tulāya vā karakaṭake vā yojetabbakam camma bhājanam pākaṭā hoti iti

original: aparikkhittā hoti. Udakapuñchanīti daṇḍamayāpi visāṇamayāpi dārumayāpi vaṭṭati, tassā
analyzed: a parikkhittā hoti udaka puñchanī iti daṇḍa mayā api visāṇa mayā api dāru mayā api vaṭṭati tassā

original: asati coḷakenāpi udakaṃ paccuddharituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: asati coḷakena api udakam paccuddharitum vaṭṭati

original: 263. Udakamātikanti udakassa āgamanamātikaṃ. Nillekhajantāgharaṃ nāma āviddhapakkhapāsakaṃ
analyzed: udaka mātikam ti udakassa āgamana mātikam nillekhajantāgharam nāma āviddha pakkha pāsakam

original: vuccati, gopānasīnaṃ upari maṇḍale pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvā katakūṭacchadanassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: vuccati gopānasīnam upari maṇḍale pakkha pāsake ṭhapetvā kata kūṭa chadanassa etam nāmam

original: Cātumāsaṃ nisīdanenāti nisīdanena cattāro māse na vippavasitabbanti attho.
analyzed: cātumāsam nisīdanena ati nisīdanena cattāraḥ māse na vippavasitabbanti attho

original: 264. Pupphābhikiṇṇesūti pupphehi santhatesu. Namatakaṃ nāma eḷakalomehi kataṃ avāyimaṃ
analyzed: puppha abhikiṇṇesu iti pupphehi santhatesu namatakam nāma eḷaka lomehi katam

original: cammakhaṇḍaparihārena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Āsittakūpadhānaṃ nāma tambalohena vā rajatena
analyzed: camma khaṇḍa parihārena paribhuñjitabbam āsittakūpadhānam nāma tamba lohena vā rajatena

original: vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, paṭikkhittattā pana dārumayāpi na vaṭṭati. Maḷorikāti
analyzed: vā katāya peḷāya etam adhivacanam paṭikkhitta ttā pana dāru mayā api na vaṭṭati maḷorikā ati

original: daṇḍadhārako vuccati. Yaṭṭhiādhārakapaṇṇādhārakapacchikapiṭṭhānipi ettheva paviṭṭhāni.
analyzed: daṇḍa dhārakaḥ vuccati yaṭṭhi ādhāraka paṇṇa ādhāraka pacchika piṭṭhāni pi etthā iva paviṭṭhāni

original: Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanato hi paṭṭhāya chiddaṃ viddhampi aviddhampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Ekabhājaneti
analyzed: ādhāraka saṅkhepa gamanataḥ hi paṭṭhāya chiddam viddham pi a viddham pi vaṭṭatiyā iva eka bhājana iti

original: ettha sace eko bhikkhu bhājanato phalaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati, tasmiṃ apagate
analyzed: ettha sace ekaḥ bhikkhu bhājanataḥ phalam vā pūvam vā gahetvā gacchati tasmin apagate

original: itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Itarassāpi tasmiṃ khīṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: itarassa sesakam bhuñjitum vaṭṭati itarassa api tasmin khīṇe puna gahetum vaṭṭati

original: 265. Aṭṭhahaṅgehīti ettha ekekenapi aṅgena samannāgatassa antosīmāya vā nissīmaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhahaṅgehi iti ettha ekekena api aṅgena samannāgatassa antosīmāya vā nissīmam

original: gantvā nadīādīsu vā nikkujjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Evaṃ nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe
analyzed: gantvā nadī ādīsu vā nikkujjitum vaṭṭati yā iva evam nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe

original: koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo – “asukassa gehe bhikkhaṃ mā gaṇhitthā”ti aññesu vihāresupi
analyzed: koci deyya dhammaḥ na gahetabbaḥ asukassa gehe bhikkham mā gaṇhittha ati aññesu vihāresu pi

original: pesetabbaṃ. Ukkujjanakāle pana yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā hatthapāsaṃ vijahāpetvā ñattidutiyakammena ukkujjitabbo.
analyzed: pesetabbam ukkujjana kāle pana yāvatatiyam yācāpetvā hattha pāsam vijahāpetvā ñatti dutiya kammena ukkujjitabbaḥ

original: 268. Purakkhatvāti aggato katvā. Saṃharantūti saṃhariyantu. Celapaṭikanti celasantharaṃ.
analyzed: purakkhatvā ati aggataḥ katvā saṃharantu uti saṃhariyantu cela paṭikam ti cela santharam

original: So kira “sace ahaṃ puttaṃ lacchāmi, akkamissati me bhagavā celapaṭika”nti iminā ajjhāsayena
analyzed: so kira sace aham puttam lacchāmi akkamissati me bhagavā cela paṭikanti iminā ajjhāsayena

original: santhari, abhabbo cesa puttalābhāya; tasmā bhagavā na akkami. Yadi akkameyya, pacchā
analyzed: santhari abhabbo ca isa putta lābhāya tasmai bhagavā na akkami yadi akkameyya pacchā

original: puttaṃ alabhanto “nāyaṃ sabbaññū”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇheyya. Idaṃ tāva bhagavato anakkamane
analyzed: puttam a labhantaḥ na ayam sabbaññū ti diṭṭhim gaṇheyya idam tāva bhagavataḥ an akkamane

original: kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā pana bhikkhūpi ye ajānantā akkameyyuṃ, te gihīnaṃ paribhūtā bhaveyyuṃ;
analyzed: kāraṇam yasmā pana bhikkhū upi ye a jānantāḥ akkameyyum te gihīnam paribhūtāḥ bhaveyyum

original: tasmā bhikkhū paribhavato mocetuṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi. Idaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpane kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā bhikkhū paribhavataḥ mocetum sikkhāpadam paññapesi idam sikkhāpada paññāpane kāraṇam

original: Maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānenāti apagatagabbhā vā hotu garugabbhā vā, evarūpesu ṭhānesu
analyzed: maṅgala atthāya yāciyamānena ati apagata gabbhā vā hotu garu gabbhā vā evarūpesu ṭhānesu

original: maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena akkamituṃ vaṭṭati. Dhotapādakaṃ nāma pādadhovanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: maṅgala atthāya yāciyamānena akkamitum vaṭṭati dhotapādakam nāma pāda dhovana ṭṭhāne

original: dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāya paccattharaṇaṃ atthataṃ hoti, taṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: dhotehi pādehi akkamana tthāya paccattharaṇam atthatam hoti tam akkamitum vaṭṭati

original: 269. Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ.
analyzed: katakam nāma paduma kaṇṇikā ākāram pāda ghaṃsana attham kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā katam

original: Taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassādibhedaṃ vā, bāhulikānuyogattā paṭikkhittameva, neva
analyzed: tam vaṭṭam vā hotu catur assa ādi bhedam vā bāhulika anuyoga ttā paṭikkhittam eva na iva

original: paṭiggahetuṃ na paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sakkharāti pāsāṇo vuccati; pāsāṇapheṇakopi
analyzed: paṭiggahetum na paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati pāsāṇaḥ vuccati pāsāṇa pheṇakaḥ api

original: vaṭṭati. Vidhūpananti vījanī vuccati. Tālavaṇṭaṃ pana tālapaṇṇehi vā kataṃ hotu veḷudantavilīvehi
analyzed: vaṭṭati vidhūpananti vījanī vuccati tālavaṇṭam pana tālapaṇṇehi vā katam hotu veḷu danta vilīvehi

original: vā morapiñchehi vā cammavikatīhi vā sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Makasabījanī dantamayavisāṇamayadaṇḍakāpi
analyzed: vā mora piñchehi vā camma vikatīhi vā sabbam vaṭṭati makasa bījanī danta maya visāṇa maya daṇḍakā api

original: vaṭṭati, vākamayabījaniyā ketakapārohakuntālapaṇṇādimayāpi saṅgahitā.
analyzed: vaṭṭati vāka maya bījaniyā ketaka pāroha kuntāla paṇṇa ādi mayā api saṅgahitā

original: 270. Gilānassa chattanti ettha yassa kāyaḍāho vā pittakopo vā hoti, cakkhu vā dubbalaṃ,
analyzed: gilānassa chattanti ettha yassa kāya ḍāhaḥ vā pitta kopaḥ vā hoti cakkhu vā dubbalam

original: añño vā koci ābādho vinā chattena uppajjati, tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: aññaḥ vā koci ābādhaḥ vinā chattena uppajjati tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattam vaṭṭati

original: Vasse pana cīvaraguttatthaṃ vāḷamigacorabhayesu ca attaguttatthampi vaṭṭati. Ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ
analyzed: vasse pana cīvara guttattham vāḷa miga cora bhayesu ca atta guttattham pi vaṭṭati eka paṇṇacchattam

original: pana sabbattheva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pana sabbattha iva vaṭṭati

original: Asissāti asi assa. Vijjotalatīti vijjotati. Daṇḍasammutinti ettha pamāṇayutto catuhatthoyeva
analyzed: asi assa ettha pamāṇa yuttaḥ

original: daṇḍo sammannitvā dātabbo. Tato ūnātiritto vināpi sammutiyā sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati. Sikkā
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ sammannitvā dātabbaḥ tatas ūna atirittaḥ vinā api sammutiyā sabbesam vaṭṭati sikkā

original: pana agilānassa na vaṭṭati, gilānassāpi sammannitvāva dātabbā.
analyzed: pana agilānassa na vaṭṭati gilānassa api sammannitvā ava dātabbā

original: 273. Romanthakassāti ettha ṭhapetvā romanthakaṃ sesānaṃ āgataṃ uggāraṃ mukhe sandhāretvā gilantānaṃ āpatti. Sace pana asandhāritameva paragalaṃ gacchati, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: romanthakassa ati ettha ṭhapetvā romanthakam sesānam āgatam uggāram mukhe sandhāretvā gilantānam āpatti sace pana a sandhāritam eva para galam gacchati vaṭṭati

original: Yaṃ diyyamānanti yaṃ dāyakehi diyyamānaṃ paṭiggahitabhājanato bahi patitaṃ, taṃ bhikkhunā sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Idaṃ bhojanavagge vaṇṇitameva.
analyzed: yam diyyamānam iti yam dāyakehi diyyamānam paṭiggahita bhājanataḥ bahi patitam tam bhikkhunā sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjitum anujānāmi iti attho idam bhojana vagge vaṇṇitam eva

original: 274. Kuppaṃ karissāmīti saddaṃ karissāmi. Nakhādīhi nakhacchedane āpatti natthi,
analyzed: kuppam karissāmi iti saddam karissāmi nakha ādīhi nakha chedane āpatti natthi

original: anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana nakhacchedanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti vīsatipi nakhe likhitamaṭṭhe
analyzed: anurakkhaṇa attham pana nakha chedanam anuññātam vīsatim aṭṭhanti vīsati pi nakhe likhitam aṭṭhe

original: kārāpenti. Malamattanti nakhato malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
analyzed: nakhataḥ mala mattam apakaḍḍhitum anujānāmi iti

original: 275. Khurasipāṭikanti khurakosakaṃ. Massuṃ kappāpentīti kattariyā massuṃ chedāpenti.
analyzed: khura sipāṭikam ti khura kosakam massum kappāpenti iti kattariyāḥ massum chedāpenti

original: Massuṃ vaḍḍhāpentīti massuṃ dīghaṃ kārenti. Golomikanti hanukamhi dīghaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ
analyzed: massum vaḍḍhāpenti iti massum dīgham kārenti golomikam hanukamhi dīgham katvā ṭhapitam

original: eḷakamassu vuccati. Caturassakanti catukoṇaṃ. Parimukhanti ure lomasaṃharaṇaṃ. Aḍḍhadukanti
analyzed: vuccati caturassakanti catukoṇam parimukhanti loma saṃharaṇam

original: udare lomarājiṭṭhapanaṃ. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti massukappāpanādīsu sabbattha āpatti
analyzed: udare lomarāji ṭhapanam āpatti dukkaṭassa ati massu kappa āpana ādīsu sabbattha āpatti

original: dukkaṭassa. Ābādhappaccayā sambādhe lomanti gaṇḍavaṇarudhiādiābādhappaccayā. Kattarikāyāti
analyzed: dukkaṭassa ābādha ppaccayā sambādhe gaṇḍa vaṇa rudhi ādi ābādha ppaccayā kattarikāya ati

original: gaṇḍavaṇarudhisīsarogābādhappaccayā. Sakkharādīhi nāsikālomaggāhāpane āpatti natthi.
analyzed: gaṇḍa vaṇa rudhi sīsa roga ābādha ppaccayā sakkhara ādīhi nāsikā loma gāhāpane āpatti natthi

original: Anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana saṇḍāso anuññāto. Na bhikkhave palitaṃ gāhāpetabbanti ettha
analyzed: anurakkhaṇa attham pana saṇḍāsaḥ anuññātaḥ na bhikkhave palitam gāhāpetabbanti ettha

original: yaṃ bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tādisaṃ lomaṃ
analyzed: yam bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhaccham ṭhitam tādisam lomam

original: palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: palitam vā a palitam vā gāhā petum vaṭṭati

original: 277. Kaṃsapattharikāti kaṃsabhaṇḍavāṇijā. Bandhanamattanti vāsikattarayaṭṭhiādīnaṃ bandhanamattaṃ.
analyzed: kaṃsapattharikā iti kaṃsa bhaṇḍa vāṇijāḥ bandhana mattam iti bandhana mattam

original: 278. Na bhikkhave akāyabandhanenāti ettha abandhitvā nikkhamantena yattha sarati,
analyzed: na bhikkhave a kāya bandhanena ati ettha a bandhitvā nikkhamantena yattha sarati

original: tattha bandhitabbaṃ. Āsanasālāya bandhissāmīti gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Saritvā yāva na bandhati,
analyzed: tattha bandhitabbam āsana sālāya bandhissāmi iti gantum vaṭṭati saritvā yāva na bandhati

original: na tāva piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Kalābukaṃ nāma bahurajjukaṃ. Deḍḍubhakaṃ nāma udakasappasīsasadisaṃ.
analyzed: na tāva piṇḍāya caritabbam kalābukam nāma bahu rajjukam deḍḍubhakam nāma udaka sappa sīsa sadisam

original: Murajaṃ nāma murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ. Maddavīṇaṃ nāma pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: murajam nāma muraja vaṭṭi saṇṭhānam veṭhetvā katam maddavīṇam nāma pāmaṅga saṇṭhānam

original: Īdisañhi ekampi na vaṭṭati, pageva bahūni. Paṭṭikaṃ sūkarantakanti ettha pakativītā
analyzed: īdisam hi ekam pi na vaṭṭati pagā iva bahūni paṭṭikam ettha pakativītā

original: vā macchakaṇṭakavāyimā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati, sesā kuñjaracchikādibhedā na vaṭṭanti.
analyzed: vā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati sesā kuñjara chikā ādi bhedāḥ na vaṭṭanti

original: Sūkarantakaṃ nāma kuñjikākosakasaṇṭhānaṃ hoti. Ekarajjukaṃ pana muddikakāyabandhanañca
analyzed: sūkarantakam nāma kuñjikā kosaka saṇṭhānam hoti eka rajjukam pana muddika kāya bandhanam ca

original: sūkarantakaṃ anulometi. Anujānāmi bhikkhave murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva
analyzed: sūkarantakam anulomā iti anujānāmi bhikkhave murajam maddavīṇanti idam

original: anuññātaṃ. Pāmaṅgadasā cettha catunnaṃ upari na vaṭṭati. Sobhaṇaṃ nāma veṭhetvā mukhavaṭṭisibbanaṃ.
analyzed: anuññātam pāmaṅgadasā ca ittha catunnam upari na vaṭṭati sobhaṇam nāma veṭhetvā mukhavaṭṭi sibbanam

original: Guṇakaṃ nāma mudiṅgasaṇṭhānena sibbanaṃ; evaṃ sibbitā hi antā thirā honti. Pavanantoti pāsanto vuccati.
analyzed: guṇakam nāma mudiṅga saṇṭhānena sibbanam evam sibbitāḥ hi antāḥ thirāḥ honti pavananto ti pāsantaḥ vuccati

original: 280. Hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ
analyzed: hatthisoṇḍakam nāma nābhi mūlataḥ hatthi soṇḍa saṇṭhānam olambakam katvā nivattham

original: coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya. Macchavāḷakaṃ nāma ekato dasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā
analyzed: coḷika aitthīnam nivāsanam viya macchavāḷakam nāma ekatas dasantam ekatas pāsantam olambetvā

original: nivatthaṃ. Catukaṇṇakaṃ nāma upari dve, heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā
analyzed: nivattham catukaṇṇakam nāma upari dve heṭṭhatas dve ti evam cattāraḥ kaṇṇe dassetvā

original: nivatthaṃ. Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivāsanaṃ. Satavalikaṃ
analyzed: nivattham tālavaṇṭakam nāma tāla vaṇṭā ākārena sāṭakam olambetvā nivāsanam sata valikam

original: nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhañjitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ, vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
analyzed: nāma dīgha sāṭakam aneka khattum obhañjitvā ovaṭṭikam karontena nivattham vāma dakkhiṇa passesu

original: vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ. Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā
analyzed: vā nirantaram valiyaḥ dassetvā nivattham sace pana jāṇutaḥ paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā

original: valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: valiyaḥ paññāyanti vaṭṭati

original: Saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentīti mallakammakārādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivāsenti; evaṃ
analyzed: saṃvelliyam nivāsenti iti malla kammakāra ādayaḥ kaccham bandhitvā nivāsenti evam

original: nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati. Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ
analyzed: nivāsetum gilānassa api magga ppaṭipannassa api na vaṭṭati yam pi maggam gacchantā ekam

original: vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari laggenti, anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā
analyzed: vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari laggenti antare vā ekam kāsāvam tathā

original: nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Gilāno pana anto kāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ
analyzed: nivāsetvā bahi aparam nivāsenti sabbam na vaṭṭati gilānaḥ pana anto kāsāvassa ovaṭṭikam

original: dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati. Agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: dassetvā aparam upari nivāsetum labhati a gilānena dve nivāsentena sa guṇam katvā

original: nivāsetabbāni. Iti yañca idha paṭikkhittaṃ, yañca sekhiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ; taṃ sabbaṃ vajjetvā
analyzed: nivāsetabbāni iti yat ca idha paṭikkhittam yat ca sekhiya vaṇṇanāyam tat sabbam vajjetvā

original: nibbikāraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ. Yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ
analyzed: nibbikāram ti maṇḍalam paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalam nivāsetabbam yaṃkiñci vikāram

original: karonto dukkaṭā na muccati. Na bhikkhave gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbanti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ
analyzed: karontaḥ dukkaṭāḥ na muccati na bhikkhave gihi pārutam pārupitabbanti evam paṭikkhittam

original: gihipārutaṃ apārupitvā, ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma, taṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
analyzed: gihi pārutam a pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe samam katvā pārupanam parimaṇḍalapārupanam nāma tat pārupitabbam

original: Tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutaṃ soṇḍapārutaṃ
analyzed: tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭa pārutam paribbājaka pārutam ekasāṭaka pārutam soṇḍa pārutam

original: antepurikapārutaṃ mahājeṭṭhakapārutaṃ kuṭipavesakapārutaṃ brāhmaṇapārutaṃ pāḷikārakapārutanti
analyzed: antepurika pārutam mahājeṭṭhaka pārutam kuṭipavesaka pārutam brāhmaṇa pārutam pāḷikāraka pārutam anti

original: evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato aññathā pārutaṃ, sabbametaṃ gihipārutaṃ nāma. Tasmā
analyzed: evamādi parimaṇḍala lakkhaṇato aññathā pārutam sabbam etam gihipārutam nāma tasmā

original: yathā setapaṭā aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhā pārupanti, yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā
analyzed: yathā seta paṭāḥ aḍḍha pālaka nigaṇṭhā pārupanti yathā ca ekacce paribbājakāḥ uram vivaritvā

original: dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti, yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa
analyzed: dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇam ṭhapenti yathā ca eka sāṭakāḥ manussāḥ nivattha sāṭakassa

original: ekenantena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti, yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo
analyzed: ekena antena piṭṭhim pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti yathā ca surā soṇḍa ādayaḥ

original: sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipantā ubho ante udare vā olambenti; piṭṭhiyaṃ vā khipanti,
analyzed: sāṭakena gīvam parikkhipantāḥ ubho ante udare vā olambenti piṭṭhiyam vā khipanti

original: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhikaṃ pārupanti, yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā
analyzed: yathā ca antepurikāyaḥ akkhi tāraka mattam dassetvā oguṇṭhikam pārupanti yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā

original: dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca kassakā
analyzed: dīghasāṭakam nivāsetvā tassa iva ekena antena sakala sarīram yathā ca kassakā

original: khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena
analyzed: khetta kuṭim pavisantā sāṭakam paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tassa iva ekena antena

original: sarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antarena sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā
analyzed: sarīram yathā ca brāhmaṇāḥ ubhinnam upakacchakānam antarena sāṭakam pavesetvā

original: aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti, yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ
analyzed: aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti yathā ca pāḷikārakaḥ bhikkhu eka aṃsa pārupanena pārutam vāma bāhum

original: vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropeti; evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete aññe ca evarūpe
analyzed: vivaritvā cīvaram aṃsakūṭam āropeti evam a pārupitvā sabbe pi ete aññe ca evarūpe

original: pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ. Tathā apārupitvā ārāme
analyzed: pārupana dose vajjetvā nibbikāram parimaṇḍalam pārupitabbam tathā a pārupitvā ārāme

original: vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāram karontassa dukkaṭam

original: 281. Muṇḍavaṭṭīti yathā rañño kuhiñci gacchato parikkhārabhaṇḍavahanamanussāti adhippāyo. Antarākājanti majjhe laggetvā dvīhi vahitabbabhāraṃ.
analyzed: muṇḍavaṭṭī iti yathā raññaḥ kuhiñci gacchataḥ parikkhāra bhaṇḍa vahana manussā ati adhippāyaḥ majjhe laggetvā dvīhi vahitabba bhāram

original: 282. Acakkhussanti cakkhūnaṃ hitaṃ na hoti; parihāniṃ janeti. Nacchādetīti na ruccati. Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamanti manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ. Atimaṭāhakanti atikhuddakaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhūnam hitam na hoti parihānim janeti na chādeti iti na ruccati aṭṭha aṅgula paramanti manussānam pamāṇa aṅgulena aṭṭha aṅgula paramam ati maṭāhakam ti ati khuddakam

original: 283. Dāyaṃ ālimpentīti tiṇavanādīsu aggiṃ denti. Paṭagginti paṭiaggiṃ. Parittanti
analyzed: dāyam ālimpenti iti aggim denti paṭagginti paṭiaggim parittanti

original: appaharitakaraṇena vā parikhākhaṇanena vā parittāṇaṃ. Ettha pana anupasampanne sati
analyzed: appaharita karaṇena vā parikhā khaṇanena vā ettha pana anupasampanne sati

original: sayaṃ aggiṃ dātuṃ na labhati, asati aggimpi dātuṃ labhati, bhūmiṃ tacchetvā tiṇānipi
analyzed: sayam aggim dātum na labhati asati aggim pi dātum labhati bhūmim tat śetvā tiṇāni pi

original: harituṃ, parikhampi khaṇituṃ, allasākhaṃ bhañjitvāpi aggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ labhati, senāsanaṃ
analyzed: haritum khaṇitum alla sākham bhañjitvā api aggim nibbāpetum labhati senāsanam

original: pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā tathā nibbāpetuṃ labhatiyeva. Udakena pana kappiyeneva labhati, na itarena.
analyzed: pattam vā appattam vā tathā nibbāpetum labhatiyā iva udakena pana kappiyena iva labhati na itarena

original: 284. Sati karaṇīyeti sukkhakaṭṭhādiggahaṇakicce sati. Porisiyanti purisappamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: sati karaṇīye iti sukkha kaṭṭha ādi gahaṇa kicce sati porisiyanti purisa ppamāṇam

original: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigādayo vā disvā maggamūḷho vā disā oloketukāmo hutvā davaḍāhaṃ vā
analyzed: āpadāsu iti vāḷa miga ādayaḥ vā disvā magga mūḍhaḥ vā disā oloketu kāmaḥ hutvā davaḍāham vā

original: udakoghaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ disvā evarūpāsu āpadāsu atiuccampi rukkhaṃ ārohituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: udaka ogham vā āgacchantam disvā evarūpāsu āpadāsu atiuccam pi rukkham ārohitum vaṭṭati

original: 285. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇāti madhurasaddā. Chandaso āropemāti vedaṃ viya sakkatabhāsāya
analyzed: madhura saddā chandasaḥ āropema ati vedam viya sakkata bhāsāya

original: vācanāmaggaṃ āropema. Sakāya niruttiyāti ettha sakā nirutti nāma sammāsambuddhena
analyzed: vācanā maggam āropema sakāya niruttiyā ti ettha sakā nirutti nāma sammāsambuddhena

original: vuttappakāro māgadhiko vohāro.
analyzed: vutta ppakāraḥ māgadhikaḥ vohāraḥ

original: 286. Lokāyataṃ nāma sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ, seto kāko, kāḷo bako; iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ.
analyzed: lokāyatam nāma sabbam ucchiṭṭham sabbam anucchiṭṭham seto kāko kāḷaḥ bakaḥ iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena ati evamādi niratthaka kāraṇa paṭisaṃyuttam titthiya sattham

original: 288. Antarā ahosīti antaritā ahosi paṭicchannā.
analyzed: antarā ahosi iti antaritā ahosi paṭicchannā

original: 289. Ābādhappaccayāti yassa ābādhassa lasuṇaṃ bhesajjaṃ; tappaccayāti attho.
analyzed: ābādha ppaccayā ti yassa ābādhassa lasuṇam bhesajjam tad paccayā ati attho

original: 290. Passāvapādukanti ettha pādukā iṭṭhakāhipi silāhipi dārūhipi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Vaccapādukāyapi eseva nayo. Pariveṇanti vaccakuṭiparikkhepabbhantaraṃ.
analyzed: ettha pādukāḥ silāhi pi dārūhi pi kātum vaṭṭati esa iva nayo pariveṇam ti vacca kuṭi parikkhepa abbhantaram

original: 293. Yathādhammo kāretabboti dukkaṭavatthumhi dukkaṭena pācittiyavatthumhi pācittiyena
analyzed: yathādhammo kāretabbo ti dukkaṭa vatthumhi dukkaṭena pācittiya vatthumhi pācittiyena

original: kāretabbo. Paharaṇatthaṃ kataṃ paharaṇīti vuccati, yassa kassaci āvudhasaṅkhātassetaṃ
analyzed: kāretabbo paharaṇa attham katam paharaṇī iti vuccati yassa kassaci āvudha saṅkhātassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ sabbaṃ lohabhaṇḍaṃ anujānāmīti attho. Katakañca kumbhakārikañcāti
analyzed: adhivacanam tam ṭhapetvā aññam sabbam loha bhaṇḍam anujānāmi iti katakam ca kumbhakārikam ca ati

original: ettha katakaṃ vuttameva. Kumbhakārikañcāti dhaniyasseva sabbamattikāmayakuṭi vuccati.
analyzed: ettha katakam vuttam eva kumbhakārikam ca ati dhaniyassa iva vuccati

original: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Khuddakavatthukathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: khuddaka vatthu kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Khuddakavatthukkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: khuddaka vatthu khandhaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Senāsanakkhandhakaṃ
analyzed: senāsana kkhandhakam

original: Vihārānujānanakathā
analyzed: vihāra anujānana kathā

original: 294. Senāsanakkhandhake – apaññattaṃ hotīti ananuññātaṃ hoti. Vihāro nāma aḍḍhayogādimuttako
analyzed: senāsana kkhandhake a paññattam hoti iti an anuññātam hoti vihāraḥ nāma aḍḍha yoga ādi muttako

original: avasesāvāso. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti dīghapāsādo. Hammiyanti upariākāsatale
analyzed: avasesa āvāsaḥ aḍḍhayogo ti supaṇṇavaṅkageham pāsādo ti dīgha pāsādaḥ hammiyanti upari ākāsa tale

original: patiṭṭhitakūṭāgāro pāsādoyeva. Guhāti iṭṭhakāguhā silāguhā dāruguhā paṃsuguhā. Āgatānāgatassa
analyzed: patiṭṭhita kūṭāgāraḥ pāsādaḥ yā iva guhā ati iṭṭhakā guhā silā guhā dāru guhā paṃsu guhā āgata anāgatassa

original: cātuddisassa saṅghassāti āgatassa ca anāgatassa ca catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārassa
analyzed: cātuddisassa saṅghassa ati āgatassa ca anāgatassa ca catūsu disāsu a paṭihata cārassa

original: cātuddisassa saṅghassa.
analyzed: cātuddisassa saṅghassa

original: 295. Anumodanagāthāsu – sītaṃ uṇhanti utuvisabhāgavasena vuttaṃ. Sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyoti
analyzed: anumodana gāthāsu sītam uṇhanti utu visa bhāga vasena vuttam sisire ca api vuṭṭhiyā ti

original: ettha sisiroti samphusitakavāto vuccati. Vuṭṭhiyoti ujukameghavuṭṭhiyo eva. Etāni
analyzed: ettha sisirā iti samphusitaka vātaḥ vuccati vuṭṭhiyā ti ujuka megha vuṭṭhiyaḥ eva etāni

original: sabbāni paṭihantīti imināva padena yojetabbāni.
analyzed: sabbāni paṭihanti iti iminā ava padena yojetabbāni

original: Paṭihaññatīti vihārena paṭihaññati. Leṇatthanti nilīyanatthaṃ. Sukhatthanti sītādiparissayābhāvena
analyzed: paṭihaññati iti vihārena paṭihaññati leṇatthanti nilīyanattham sukhatthanti sītā ādi parissaya abhāvena

original: sukhavihāratthaṃ. Jhāyituñca vipassitunti idampi padadvayaṃ “sukhatthañcā”ti imināva
analyzed: sukha vihāra attham jhāyitum ca vipassitum ti idam pi pada dvayam sukha attham ca ati

original: padena yojetabbaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – sukhatthañca vihāradānaṃ, katamaṃ sukhatthaṃ?
analyzed: padena yojetabbam idam hi vuttam hoti sukha attham ca vihāra dānam katamam sukha attham

original: Jhāyituṃ vipassituñca yaṃ sukhaṃ, tadatthaṃ. Atha vā parapadenapi yojetabbaṃ – jhāyituñca
analyzed: jhāyitum vipassitum ca yam sukham tad attham atha vā para padena api yojetabbam jhāyitum ca

original: vipassituñca vihāradānaṃ; idha jhāyissanti vipassissantīti dadato vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa
analyzed: vipassitum ca vihāra dānam idha jhāyissanti vipassissanti iti dadataḥ vihāra dānam saṅghassa

original: aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “so ca sabbadado hoti, yo dadāti upassaya”nti.
analyzed: aggam buddhena vaṇṇitam vuttam ha etam so ca sabba dadaḥ hoti yaḥ dadāti upassayanti

original: Yasmā ca aggaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ, “tasmā hi paṇḍito poso”ti gāthā. Vāsayettha bahussuteti
analyzed: ca aggam vaṇṇitam tasmai hi paṇḍitaḥ poso iti gāthāḥ vāsayettha bahu ssuta iti

original: ettha vihāre pariyattibahussute ca paṭivedhabahussute ca vāseyya. Tesaṃ annañcāti
analyzed: ettha vihāre pariyatti bahu ssute ca paṭivedha bahu ssute ca vāseyya tesam annam ca ati

original: yaṃ tesaṃ anucchavikaṃ annañca pānañca vatthāni ca mañcapīṭhādisenāsanāni ca, taṃ
analyzed: yam tesam anucchavikam annam ca pānam ca vatthāni ca mañca pīṭha ādi senāsanāni ca taṃ

original: sabbaṃ tesu ujubhūtesu akuṭilacittesu. Dadeyyāti nidaheyya. Tañca kho vippasannena
analyzed: sabbam tesu uju bhūtesu akuṭila cittesu dadeyya ati nidaheyya tat ca kho vippasannena

original: cetasā na cittappasādaṃ virādhetvā, evaṃ vippasannacittassa hi te tassa dhammaṃ desenti…pe…
analyzed: cetasā na citta ppasādam virādhetvā evam vippasanna cittassa hi te tassa dhammam desenti pe

original: parinibbāti anāsavoti.
analyzed: parinibbāti anāsavaḥ ti

original: 296. Āviñchanacchiddaṃ āviñchanarajjunti ettha rajju nāma sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhena
analyzed: āviñchana chiddam āviñchana rajjunti ettha rajju nāma

original: katā hoti, vaṭṭatiyeva; na kāci na vaṭṭati. Tīṇi tāḷānīti tisso kuñcikāyo. Yantakaṃ
analyzed: katā hoti vaṭṭatiyā iva na kāci na vaṭṭati tīṇi tāḷāni iti tisso kuñcikāyaḥ yantakam

original: sūcikanti ettha yaṃ yaṃ jānāti taṃ taṃ yantakaṃ, tassa vivaraṇasūcikañca kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: sūcikam ti ettha yam yam jānāti tam tam yantakam tassa vivaraṇa sūcikam ca kātum vaṭṭati

original: Vedikāvātapānaṃ nāma cetiye vedikāsadisaṃ. Jālavātapānaṃ nāma jālakabaddhaṃ. Salākavātapānaṃ
analyzed: vedikāvātapānam nāma cetiye vedikā sadisam jālavātapānam nāma jālaka baddham salāka vāta pānam

original: nāma thambhakavātapānaṃ. Cakkalikanti ettha coḷakapādapuñchanaṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti
analyzed: nāma thambhaka vāta pānam ettha coḷaka pāda puñchanam bandhitum anujānāmi iti

original: attho. Vātapānabhisīti vātapānappamāṇena bhisiṃ katvā bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
analyzed: atthaḥ vāta pāna bhisī iti vāta pāna ppamāṇena bhisim katvā bandhitum anujānāmi iti atthaḥ

original: Miḍḍhinti miḍḍhakaṃ. Bidalamañcakanti vettamañcaṃ; veḷuvilīvehi vā vītaṃ.
analyzed: miḍḍhinti miḍḍhakam vettamañcam vā vītam

original: 297. Āsandikoti caturassapīṭhaṃ vuccati. Uccakampi āsandikanti vacanato ekatobhāgena
analyzed: āsandiko ti caturassa pīṭham vuccati uccakampi āsandikanti vacanataḥ ekatobhāgena

original: dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ vaṭṭati, caturassaāsandiko pana pamāṇātikkantopi
analyzed: dīgha pīṭham eva hi aṭṭha aṅgula pādakam vaṭṭati catur assa āsandikaḥ pana pamāṇa atikkantaḥ api

original: vaṭṭatīti veditabbo. Sattaṅgo nāma tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañco, ayampi
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti veditabbaḥ sattaṅgaḥ nāma tīsu disāsu apassayam katvā ayam pi

original: pamāṇātikkanto vaṭṭati. Bhaddapīṭhanti vettamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ vuccati. Pīṭhikāti pilotikābaddhapīṭhameva.
analyzed: pamāṇa atikkantaḥ vaṭṭati bhadda pīṭhanti vetta mayam pīṭham vuccati pīṭhikā ati pilotikā baddha pīṭham eva

original: Eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ nāma dārupaṭṭikāya upari pāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya katapīṭhaṃ
analyzed: eḷakapādapīṭham nāma dāru paṭṭikāya upari pāde ṭhapetvā bhojana phalakam kata pīṭham

original: vuccati. Āmalakavaṭṭikapīṭhaṃ nāma āmalakākārena yojitaṃ bahupādakapīṭhaṃ. Imāni
analyzed: vuccati āmalakavaṭṭika pīṭham nāma āmalaka ākārena yojitam bahu pādaka pīṭham imāni

original: tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatapīṭhāni. Dārumayaṃ pana sabbaṃ pīṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamettha vinicchayo.
analyzed: tāva pāḷiyam āgata pīṭhāni dāru mayam pana sabbam pīṭham vaṭṭati iti ayam ettha vinicchayo

original: Kocchanti usiramayaṃ vā muñjapabbajamayaṃ vā.
analyzed: usira mayam vā muñja pabbaja mayam vā

original: Aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ mañcapaṭipādakanti ettha manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulameva aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭha aṅgula paramam mañca paṭipādakanti ettha manussānam pamāṇa aṅgulam eva aṭṭha aṅgulam

original: Cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā chavisaṃrakkhaṇatthāya attharaṇaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā chavi saṃrakkhaṇa atthāya attharaṇam vuccati

original: Rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ. Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ
analyzed: rukkha tūlanti simbali rukkha ādīnam yesam kesañci rukkhānam tūlam latā tūlanti khīravalli ādīnam

original: yāsaṃ kāsañci vallīnaṃ tūlaṃ. Poṭakitūlanti poṭakitiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ
analyzed: vallīnam tūlam poṭaki tūlanti poṭaki tiṇa ādīnam yesam kesañci tiṇa jātikānam

original: antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ. Etehi tīhi sabbabhūtagāmā saṅgahitā honti. Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo
analyzed: antamasaḥ ucchunaḷa ādīnam pi tūlam etehi tīhi sabba bhūta gāmā saṅgahitāḥ honti rukkha valli tiṇa jātiyaḥ

original: hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo nāma natthi, tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane
analyzed: hi muñcitvā aññaḥ bhūtagāmaḥ nāma natthi tasmai yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlam bimbohane

original: vaṭṭati, bhisiṃ pana pāpuṇitvā sabbampetaṃ akappiyatūlanti vuccati. Na kevalañca
analyzed: vaṭṭati bhisim pana pāpuṇitvā sabbam petam akappiya tūlam ti vuccati na kevalam ca

original: bimbohane etaṃ tūlameva, haṃsamorādīnaṃ sabbasakuṇānaṃ sīhādīnaṃ sabbacatuppadānañca
analyzed: bimbohane etam tūlam eva haṃsa mora ādīnam sabba sakuṇānam sīha ādīnam sabba catuppadānam ca

original: lomampi vaṭṭati. Piyaṅgupupphabakuḷapupphādi pana yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tamālapattaṃ
analyzed: lomam pi vaṭṭati piyaṅgu puppha bakuḷa puppha ādi pana yaṃkiñci puppham na vaṭṭati tamāla pattam

original: suddhameva na vaṭṭati, missakaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Bhisīnaṃ anuññātaṃ pañcavidhaṃ uṇṇāditūlampi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: suddham eva na vaṭṭati missakam pana vaṭṭati bhisīnam anuññātam pañcavidham uṇṇa ādi tūlam pi vaṭṭati

original: Addhakāyikānīti upaḍḍhakāyappamāṇāni, yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti.
analyzed: addhakāyikāni iti upaḍḍha kāya ppamāṇāni yesu kaṭitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva sīsam upadahanti

original: Sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ minīyamānaṃ
analyzed: sīsappamāṇam nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnam kaṇṇānam antaram minīyamānam

original: vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti, majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti. Dīghato pana
analyzed: vidatthi ca iva catur aṅgulam ca hoti majjha ṭṭhānam muṭṭhi ratanam hoti dīghataḥ pana

original: diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ sīsappamāṇassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo.
analyzed: diyaḍḍha ratanam vā dvi ratanam vā ati kurundiyam vuttam ayam sīsa ppamāṇassa ukkaṭṭha paricchedo

original: Ito uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati, heṭṭhā pana vaṭṭati. Agilānassa sīsupadhānañca pādupadhānañcāti
analyzed: itas uddham na vaṭṭati heṭṭhā pana vaṭṭati a gilānassa sīsa upadhānam ca pāda upadhānam ca ati

original: dvayameva vaṭṭati. Gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ katvā nipajjitumpi
analyzed: dvayam eva vaṭṭati gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇam katvā nipajjitum pi

original: vaṭṭati. “Yāni pana bhisīnaṃ anuññātāni pañca kappiyatūlāni, tehi bimbohanaṃ mahantampi
analyzed: vaṭṭati yāni pana bhisīnam anuññātāni pañca kappiya tūlāni tehi bimbohanam mahantam pi

original: vaṭṭatī”ti phussadevatthero āha. Vinayadharaupatissatthero pana “bimbohanaṃ karissāmī’ti
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti phussadeva ttheraḥ āha vinayadhara aupatissa theraḥ pana bimbohanam karissāmi iti

original: kappiyatūlaṃ vā akappiyatūlaṃ vā pakkhipitvā karontassa pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
analyzed: kappiya tūlam vā a kappiya tūlam vā pakkhipitvā karontassa pamāṇam eva vaṭṭati iti āha

original: Pañca bhisiyoti pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritabhisiyo. Tūlagaṇanāya hi etāsaṃ gaṇanā vuttā.
analyzed: pañca bhisiyaḥ ti pañcahi uṇṇa ādīhi pūrita bhisiyaḥ tūla gaṇanāya hi etāsam gaṇanā vuttā

original: Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ, ṭhapetvā manussalomaṃ yaṃkiñci
analyzed: tattha uṇṇa ggahaṇena na kevalam eḷaka lomam eva gahitam ṭhapetvā manussa lomam yaṃkiñcid

original: kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomaṃ, sabbaṃ idha uṇṇaggahaṇeneva
analyzed: kappiya akappiya maṃsa jātīnam pakkhi catuppadānam lomam sabbam idha uṇṇa ggahaṇena iva

original: gahitaṃ. Tasmā channaṃ cīvarānaṃ channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ
analyzed: gahitam tasmai channam cīvara anam channam anuloma cīvara anam ca aññatarena bhisi chavim

original: katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakalomāni pana apakkhipitvā
analyzed: katvā tam sabbam pakkhipitvā bhisim kātum vaṭṭati eḷaka lomāni pana a pakkhipitvā

original: kambalameva catugguṇaṃ vā pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchati.
analyzed: kambalam eva catugguṇam vā pañcaguṇam vā pakkhipitvā katā api uṇṇa bhisi saṅkhyam eva gacchati

original: Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃkiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā vā anto pakkhipitvā
analyzed: coḷa bhisi ādīsu yaṃkiñci nava coḷam vā purāṇa coḷam vā saṃharitvā vā antar pakkhipitvā

original: vā katā coḷabhisi, yaṃkiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi, yaṃkiñci tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
analyzed: vā katā coḷa bhisi yaṃkiñci vākam pakkhipitvā katā vāka bhisi yaṃkiñci tiṇam pakkhipitvā

original: katā tiṇabhisi, aññatra suddhatamālapattaṃ yaṃkiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇabhisīti
analyzed: katā tiṇa bhisi aññatra suddha tamāla pattam yaṃkiñci paṇṇam pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇa bhisi iti

original: veditabbā. Tamālapattaṃ pana aññena missameva vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhisiyā
analyzed: veditabbā tamāla pattam pana aññena missam eva vaṭṭati suddham na vaṭṭati bhisiyā

original: pamāṇaniyamo natthi, mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti
analyzed: pamāṇa niyamaḥ natthi mañca bhisi pīṭha bhisi bhūmattharaṇa bhisi caṅkamana bhisi pāda puñchana bhisi iti

original: etāsaṃ anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ uṇṇādipañcavidhatūlampi
analyzed: etāsam anurūpataḥ sat lakkhetvā attanaḥ ruci vasena pamāṇam kātabbam yam pana itam uṇṇa ādi pañcavidha tūlam pi

original: bhisiyaṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ “masūrakepi vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
analyzed: bhisiyam vaṭṭati tam masūrake pi vaṭṭati iti kurundiyam vuttam etena masūrakam paribhuñjitum

original: vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti siddham hoti

original: Mañcabhisiṃ pīṭhe santharantīti mañcabhisiṃ pīṭhe attharanti; attharaṇatthāya harantīti
analyzed: mañca bhisim pīṭhe santharanti iti mañca bhisim pīṭhe attharanti attharaṇa tthāya haranti iti

original: yujjati. Ullokaṃ akaritvāti heṭṭhā cimilikaṃ adatvā. Phositunti rajanena vā haliddiyā
analyzed: yujjati ullokam a karitvā ati heṭṭhā cimilikam rajanena vā haliddiyā

original: vā upari phusitāni dātuṃ. Bhattikammanti bhisicchaviyā upari bhattikammaṃ. Hatthabhattinti pañcaṅgulibhattiṃ.
analyzed: vā upari phusitāni dātum bhatti kammanti bhisi chaviyāḥ upari bhatti kammam hattha bhattim ti pañca aṅguli bhattim

original: 298. Ikkāsanti rukkhaniyyāsaṃ vā silesaṃ vā. Piṭṭhamaddanti piṭṭhakhaliṃ. Kuṇḍakamattikanti
analyzed: ikkāsanti rukkha niyyāsam vā silesam vā piṭṭha maddanti piṭṭha khalim kuṇḍaka mattikanti

original: kuṇḍakamissakamattikaṃ. Sāsapakuṭṭanti sāsapapiṭṭhaṃ. Sitthatelakanti vilīnamadhusitthakaṃ.
analyzed: kuṇḍaka missaka mattikam sāsapa kuṭṭanti sāsapa piṭṭham sittha telakam ti vilīna madhu sitthakam

original: Accussannaṃ hotīti bindu bindu hutvā tiṭṭhati. Paccuddharitunti puñchituṃ. Gaṇḍumattikanti
analyzed: accussannam hoti iti bindu bindu hutvā tiṭṭhati paccuddharitum ti puñchitum gaṇḍumattikam ti

original: gaṇḍuppādagūthamattikaṃ. Kasāvanti āmalakaharītakānaṃ kasāvaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇḍuppāda gūtha mattikam kasāvanti āmalaka harītakānam kasāvam

original: 299. Na bhikkhave paṭibhānacittanti ettha na kevalaṃ itthipurisarūpameva, tiracchānarūpampi
analyzed: na bhikkhave paṭibhāna cittam ti ettha na kevalam itthi purisa rūpam eva tiracchāna rūpam pi

original: antamaso gaṇḍuppādarūpampi bhikkhuno sayaṃ kātuṃ vā “karohī”ti vattuṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
analyzed: antamasaḥ gaṇḍuppāda rūpam pi bhikkhuno sayam kātum vā karohi iti vattum vā na vaṭṭati

original: “upāsaka dvārapālaṃ karohī”ti vattumpi na labbhati. Jātakapakaraṇaasadisadānādīni
analyzed: upāsaka dvārapālam karohi iti vattum pi na labbhati jātaka pakaraṇa asadisa dāna ādīni

original: pana pasādanīyāni nibbidāpaṭisaṃyuttāni vā vatthūni parehi kārāpetuṃ labbhati. Mālākammādīni
analyzed: pana pasādanīyāni nibbidā paṭisaṃyuttāni vā vatthūni parehi kārāpetum labbhati mālā kamma ādīni

original: sayampi kātuṃ labbhati.
analyzed: sayam pi kātum labbhati

original: 300. Aḷakamandāti ekaṅgaṇā manussābhikiṇṇā. Tayo gabbheti ettha sivikāgabbhoti caturassagabbho.
analyzed: aḷakamandā ati ekaṅgaṇā manussābhikiṇṇā tayo gabbhe ti ettha sivikāgabbho ti catur assa gabbhaḥ

original: Nāḷikāgabbhoti vitthārato diguṇatiguṇāyāmo dīghagabbho. Hammiyagabbhoti ākāsatale
analyzed: nāḷikāgabbho ti vitthārataḥ diguṇa tiguṇa āyāmaḥ dīgha gabbhaḥ hammiya gabbhaḥ ti ākāsa tale

original: kūṭāgāragabbho vā muṇḍacchadanagabbho vā.
analyzed: kūṭāgāra gabbhaḥ vā muṇḍacchadana gabbhaḥ vā

original: Kalaṅkapādakanti rukkhaṃ vijjhitvā tattha khāṇuke ākoṭetvā kataṃ, taṃ āharimaṃ bhittipādaṃ
analyzed: kalaṅkapādakam ti rukkham vijjhitvā tattha khāṇuke ākoṭetvā katam tam bhitti pādam

original: jiṇṇakuṭṭapādassa upatthambhanatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Parittāṇakiṭikanti
analyzed: jiṇṇa kuṭṭa pādassa upatthambhana attham bhūmiyam patiṭṭhāpetum anujānāmi iti parittāṇa kiṭikanti

original: vassaparittāṇatthaṃ kiṭikaṃ. Uddasudhanti vacchakagomayena ceva chārikāya ca saddhiṃ madditamattikaṃ.
analyzed: vassa parittāṇa ttham kiṭikam vacchaka gomayena ca iva chārikāya ca saddhim maddita mattikam

original: Āḷindo nāma pamukhaṃ vuccati. Paghanaṃ nāma yaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca pādehi
analyzed: āḷindaḥ nāma pamukham vuccati paghanam nāma yam nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca pādehi

original: hananti, tassa vihāradvāre ubhato kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā katapadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
analyzed: hananti tassa vihāra dvāre ubhatas kuṭṭam nīharitvā kata padesassa itam adhivacanaṃ

original: “paghāna”ntipi vuccati. Pakuṭṭanti majjhe gabbhassa samantā pariyāgāro vuccati. “Pakuṭa”ntipi
analyzed: paghānanti pi vuccati pakuṭṭanti majjhe gabbhassa samantā pariyāgāraḥ vuccati pakuṭanti pi

original: pāṭho. Osārakanti anāḷindake vihāre vaṃsaṃ datvā tato daṇḍake osāretvā katachadanapamukhaṃ.
analyzed: anāḷindake vihāre vaṃsam da tvā tatas daṇḍake osāretvā kata chadana pamukham

original: Saṃsāraṇakiṭiko nāma cakkalayutto kiṭiko.
analyzed: saṃsāraṇa kiṭikaḥ nāma cakkala yutto kiṭiko

original: 301. Pānīyabhājananti pivantānaṃ pānīyadānabhājanaṃ. Uḷuṅko ca thālakañca pānīyasaṅkhassa anulomāni.
analyzed: pānīya bhājananti pivantānam pānīya dāna bhājanam uḷuṅkaḥ ca thālakam ca pānīya saṅkhassa anulomāni

original: 303. Apesīti dīghadārumhi khāṇuke pavesetvā kaṇṭakasākhāhi vinandhitvā kataṃ dvārathakanakaṃ. Palighoti gāmadvāresu viya cakkayuttaṃ dvārathakanakaṃ.
analyzed: dīghadārumhi khāṇuke pavesetvā kaṇṭaka sākhāhi vinandhitvā katam dvāratha kanakam gāma dvāresu viya cakka yuttam dvāratha kanakam

original: 305. Assatarīhi yuttā rathā assatarīrathā. Āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāti āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāni.
analyzed: assatarīhi yuttāḥ rathāḥ assatarī rathāḥ āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalāti āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalāni

original: Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Sītibhūtoti kilesātapābhāvena sītibhūto. Nirūpadhīti kilesupadhiabhāvena nirūpadhīti vuccati.
analyzed: parinibbutoti kilesa parinibbānena parinibbutaḥ sīti bhūtaḥ iti kilesa ātapa abhāvena sīti bhūtaḥ nirūpadhī iti kilesupadhi abhāvena nirūpadhī iti vuccati

original: Sabbā āsattiyo chetvāti rūpādīsu vā visayesu sabbabhavesu vā patthanāyo chinditvā. Hadaye daranti citte kilesadarathaṃ vinetvā. Veyyāyikanti vayakaraṇaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: sabbāḥ āsattiyaḥ chetvā ti rūpa ādīsu vā visayesu sabba bhavesu vā patthanāyo chinditvā hadaye citte kilesa daratham vinetvā veyyāyikam ti vaya karaṇam vuccati

original: 307. Ādeyyavācoti tassa vacanaṃ bahū janā ādiyitabbaṃ sotabbaṃ maññantīti attho.
analyzed: ādeyya vācaḥ ti tassa vacanam bahū janāḥ ādiyitabbam sotabbam maññanti iti attho

original: Ārāme akaṃsūti ye sadhanā, te attano dhanena akaṃsu. Ye mandadhanā ceva adhanā ca,
analyzed: ārāme akaṃsūti ye sa dhanā te attanaḥ dhanena akaṃsu ye manda dhanā ca iva adhanā ca

original: tesaṃ dhanaṃ adāsi. Iti so satasahassakahāpaṇe satasahassagghanakañca bhaṇḍaṃ datvā
analyzed: tesam dhanam adāsi iti saḥ sata sahassa kahāpaṇe bhaṇḍam da tvā

original: pañcacattālīsayojanike addhāne yojane yojane vihārapatiṭṭhānaṃ katvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
analyzed: pañcacattālīsa yojanike addhāne yojane yojane vihāra patiṭṭhānam katvā sāvatthim agamāsi

original: Koṭisantharaṃ santharāpesīti kahāpaṇakoṭiyā kahāpaṇakoṭiṃ paṭipādetvā santhari. Ye
analyzed: koṭi santharam kahāpaṇa koṭiyā kahāpaṇa koṭim paṭipādetvā santhari ye

original: tattha rukkhā vā pokkharaṇiyo vā tesaṃ parikkhepappamāṇaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: tattha rukkhāḥ vā pokkharaṇiyaḥ vā tesam parikkhepa ppamāṇam gahetvā aññasmim ṭhāne

original: santharitvā adāsi. Evamassa aṭṭhārasakoṭikaṃ nidhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
analyzed: santharitvā adāsi evam assa aṭṭhārasa koṭikam nidhānam parikkhayam agamāsi

original: Kumārassa etadahosīti gahapatino evaṃ bahudhanaṃ cajantassāpi mukhassa vippasannākāraṃ disvā etaṃ ahosi. Koṭṭhakaṃ māpesīti sattabhūmikaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādaṃ māpesi.
analyzed: kumārassa etat ahosi iti gahapatino evam bahu dhanam cajantassa api mukhassa vippasanna ākāram disvā etam ahosi koṭṭhakam māpesi iti satta bhūmikam dvāra koṭṭhaka pāsādam māpesi

original: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati jetavane vihāre kārāpesi…pe… maṇḍape kārāpesīti aparāhipi
analyzed: atha kho anāthapiṇḍikaḥ gahapati jetavane vihāre maṇḍape kārāpesi iti

original: aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi ete vihārādayo kārāpesi aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇāya bhūmiyā. Vipassissa
analyzed: aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi ete vihāra ādayo aṭṭhakarīsa pamāṇāya bhūmiyā vipassissa

original: hi bhagavato punabbasumitto gahapati yojanappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsantharena
analyzed: hi bhagavataḥ punar basumittaḥ gahapati yojana ppamāṇam bhūmim suvaṇṇiṭṭha kāsantharena

original: kiṇitvā vihāraṃ kārāpesi. Sikhissa pana sirivaḍḍho gahapati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇayaṭṭhisantharena,
analyzed: kiṇitvā vihāram kārāpesi sikhissa pana sirivaḍḍhaḥ gahapati tiga avuta ppamāṇam suvaṇṇa yaṭṭhi santharena

original: vessabhussa sotthijo gahapati aḍḍhayojanappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaphālasantharena, kakusandhassa
analyzed: vessabhussa sotthijaḥ gahapati aḍḍha yojana ppamāṇam suvaṇṇa phāla santharena kakusandhassa

original: pana accuto gahapati gāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇahatthipadasantharena, koṇāgamanassa uggo
analyzed: pana accutaḥ gahapati gāvuta ppamāṇam suvaṇṇa hatthi pada santharena koṇa āgamanassa uggo

original: gahapati aḍḍhagāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāsantharena, kassapassa sumaṅgalo gahapati
analyzed: gahapati aḍḍhagau utappamāṇam suvaṇṇiṭṭha kāsantharena kassapassa sumaṅgalaḥ gahapati

original: vīsatiusabhappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇakacchapasantharena, amhākaṃ bhagavato sudatto gahapati
analyzed: vīsati usabha ppamāṇam suvaṇṇa kacchapa santharena amhākam bhagavataḥ sudattaḥ gahapati

original: aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ bhūmiṃ kahāpaṇasantharena kiṇitvā vihāraṃ kārāpesīti; evaṃ anupubbena
analyzed: aṭṭha karīsa ppamāṇam bhūmim kahāpaṇa santharena kiṇitvā vihāram kārāpesi iti evam anupubbena

original: parihāyanti sampattiyoti alameva sabbasampattīsu virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitunti.
analyzed: parihāyanti sampattiyaḥ ti alam eva sabba sampattīsu virajjitum alam vimuccitum ti

original: 308. Khaṇḍanti bhinnokāso. Phullanti phalitokāso. Paṭisaṅkharissatīti pākatikaṃ karissati.
analyzed: khaṇḍanti bhinna ukāso phullanti phalita ukāso paṭisaṅkharissati iti pākatikam karissati

original: Laddhanavakammena pana bhikkhunā vāsipharasunikhādanādīni gahetvā sayaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
analyzed: laddha nava kammena pana bhikkhunā vāsi pharasu nikhādana ādīni gahetvā sayam na kātabbam

original: katākataṃ jānitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kata akatam jānitabbam

original: 310. Piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvāti thero kira gilāne paṭijagganto jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe saṅgaṇhanto
analyzed: piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ gantvā iti thero kira gilāne paṭijaggantaḥ jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe saṅgaṇhantaḥ

original: sabbapacchato āgacchati. Idamassa cārittaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā”ti.
analyzed: sabba pacchatas āgacchati idam assa cārittam tena vuttam piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ gantvā iti

original: Aggāsananti therāsanaṃ. Aggodakanti dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Aggapiṇḍanti saṅghattherapiṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: aggāsananti thera āsanam aggodakanti dakkhiṇa udakam agga piṇḍanti saṅgha tthera piṇḍam

original: Antarā satthīnaṃ karitvāti catunnaṃ pādānaṃ antare karitvā.
analyzed: antarā satthīnam karitvā ati catunnam pādānam antare karitvā

original: 315. Patiṭṭhāpesīti aṭṭhārasakoṭipariccāgaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ sabbāpi catupaṇṇāsakoṭiyo pariccaji.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpesi iti aṭṭhārasa koṭi pariccāgam katvā patiṭṭhāpesi evam sabbā api catupaṇṇāsa koṭiyaḥ pariccaji

original: Vihārānujānanakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vihāra anujānana kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Āsanappaṭibāhanādikathā
analyzed: āsana paṭibāhana ādi kathā

original: 316. Vippakatabhojanoti antaraghare vā vihāre vā araññe vā yattha katthaci bhuñjamāno
analyzed: vippakata bhojano ti antara ghare vā vihāre vā araññe vā yattha katthaci bhuñjamāno

original: bhikkhu aniṭṭhite bhojane na vuṭṭhāpetabbo. Antaraghare pacchā āgatena bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: bhikkhu a niṭṭhite bhojane na vuṭṭhāpetabbaḥ antaraghare pacchā āgatena bhikkham gahetvā

original: gantabbaṃ. Sace manussā vā bhikkhū vā “pavisathā”ti vadanti, “mayi pavisante bhikkhū
analyzed: gantabbam sace manussāḥ vā bhikkhū vā pavisatha ati vadanti mayi pavisante bhikkhū

original: uṭṭhahissantī”ti vattabbaṃ. “Etha, bhante, āsanaṃ atthī”ti vuttena pana pavisitabbaṃ.
analyzed: uṭṭhahissanti iti vattabbam etha bhante āsanam atthi iti vuttena pana pavisitabbam

original: Sace koci kiñci na vadati, āsanasālaṃ gantvā atisamīpaṃ agantvā sabhāgaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ.
analyzed: sace koci kiñci na vadati āsana sālam gantvā atisamīpam a gantvā sabhā gaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbam

original: Okāse kate “pavisathā”ti vuttena pana pavisitabbaṃ. Sace pana yaṃ āsanaṃ tassa pāpuṇāti,
analyzed: okāse kate pavisatha ati vuttena pana pavisitabbam sace pana yam āsanam tassa pāpuṇāti

original: tattha abhuñjanto bhikkhu nisinno hoti, taṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yāgukhajjakādīsu
analyzed: tattha a bhuñjantaḥ bhikkhu nisinnaḥ hoti tam uṭṭhāpetum vaṭṭati yāgu khajjaka ādīsu

original: pana yaṃkiñci pivitvā vā khāditvā vā yāva añño āgacchati, tāva nisinnaṃ rittahatthampi
analyzed: pana yaṃkiñci pivitvā vā khāditvā vā yāva aññaḥ āgacchati tāva nisinnam ritta hattham pi

original: vuṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vippakatabhojanoyeva hi so hoti.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāpetum na vaṭṭati vippakata bhojanoyā iva hi so hoti

original: Sace vuṭṭhāpetīti sace āpattiṃ atikkamitvāpi vuṭṭhāpetiyeva. Pavārito ca hotīti yaṃ
analyzed: sace vuṭṭhāpeti iti sace āpattim atikkamitvā api pavāritaḥ ca hoti iti yam

original: so vuṭṭhāpeti, ayañca bhikkhu pavārito ca hoti, tena vattabbo – “gaccha udakaṃ āharāhī”ti.
analyzed: so vuṭṭhāpeti ayam ca bhikkhu pavārito ca hoti tena vattabbaḥ gaccha udakam āharāhi iti

original: Vuḍḍhatarañhi bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetuṃ idameva ekaṃ ṭhānanti. Sace so udakampi na āharati,
analyzed: vuḍḍhataran hi bhikkhum āṇāpetum idam eva ekam ṭhānan ti sace saḥ udakam pi na āharati

original: tato yañca navakatarena kattabbaṃ, taṃ dassento “sādhukaṃ sitthānī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tatas yat ca navakatarena kattabbam tam dassento sādhukam sitthāni iti ādim āha

original: Gilānassa patirūpaṃ seyyanti ettha yo kāsabhagandarātisārādīhi gilāno hoti, kheḷamallakavaccakapālādīni
analyzed: gilānassa patirūpam ettha yaḥ kāsa bhagandara atisāra ādīhi gilānaḥ hoti kheḷa mallaka vacca kapāla ādīni

original: ṭhapetabbāni honti. Kuṭṭhi vā hoti, senāsanaṃ dūseti; evarūpassa heṭṭhāpāsādapaṇṇasālādīsu
analyzed: ṭhapetabbāni honti kuṭṭhi vā hoti senāsanam dūseti evarūpassa heṭṭhā pāsāda paṇṇa sāla ādīsu

original: aññataraṃ ekamantaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Yasmiṃ vasante senāsanaṃ na dussati, tassa
analyzed: aññataram ekamantam senāsanam dātabbam yasmin vasante senāsanam na dussati tassa

original: varaseyyāpi dātabbāva. Yopi sinehapānavirecananatthukammādīsu yaṃkiñci bhesajjaṃ
analyzed: varaseyyā api yaṃ kiñci bhesajjam

original: karoti, sabbo so gilānoyeva, tassāpi sallakkhetvā patirūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Lesakappenāti
analyzed: karoti sabbaḥ saḥ gilānaḥ yā iva tassa api sallakkhetvā patirūpam senāsanam dātabbam lesa kappena ati

original: appakena sīsābādhādimattena. Bhikkhū gaṇetvāti “ettakā nāma bhikkhū”ti vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ paricchedaṃ ñatvā.
analyzed: appakena sīsa ābādha ādi mattena bhikkhū gaṇetvā ti ettakāḥ nāma bhikkhū iti vihāre bhikkhūnam paricchedam ñatvā

original: Āsanappaṭibāhanādikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āsana paṭibāhana ādi kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Senāsanaggāhakathā
analyzed: senāsana ggāha kathā

original: 318. Seyyāti mañcaṭṭhānāni vuccanti. Seyyaggenāti seyyāparicchedena, vassūpanāyikadivase
analyzed: seyyā ati mañca ṭṭhānāni vuccanti seyyaggena ati seyyā paricchedena vassūpanāyika divase

original: kālaṃ ghosetvā ekamañcaṭṭhānaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno gāhetuṃ anujānāmīti attho. Seyyaggena
analyzed: kālam ghosetvā eka mañca ṭṭhānam ekassa bhikkhuno gāhetum anujānāmi iti seyyaggena

original: gāhentāti seyyāparicchedena gāhiyamānā. Seyyā ussārayiṃsūti mañcaṭṭhānāni atirekāni
analyzed: gāhentā ati seyyā paricchedena gāhiyamānā seyyā ussārayiṃsū ti mañca ṭṭhānāni atirekāni

original: ahesuṃ. Vihāraggādīsupi eseva nayo. Anubhāganti puna aparampi bhāgaṃ dātuṃ. Atimandesu
analyzed: ahesum bhāgam dātum ati mandesu

original: hi bhikkhūsu ekekassa bhikkhuno dve tīṇi pariveṇāni dātabbāni. Na akāmā dātabboti
analyzed: hi bhikkhūsu ekekassa bhikkhunaḥ dve tīṇi pariveṇāni dātabbāni na akāmā dātabbā uti

original: anicchāya na dātabbo. Tattha vassūpanāyikadivase gahite anubhāge pacchā āgatānaṃ
analyzed: an icchāya na dātabbaḥ tattha vassūpanāyika divase gahite anubhāge pacchā āgatānam

original: na attano aruciyā so anubhāgo dātabbo. Sace pana yena gahito, so ca attano ruciyā
analyzed: na attanaḥ aruciyā saḥ anubhāgaḥ dātabbaḥ sace pana yena gahito saḥ ca attanaḥ ruciyā

original: taṃ anubhāgaṃ vā paṭhamabhāgaṃ vā deti, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: tam anubhāgam vā paṭhama bhāgam vā deti vaṭṭati

original: Nissīme ṭhitassāti upacārasīmato bahi ṭhitassa. Anto upacārasīmāya pana dūre ṭhitassāpi
analyzed: nissīme ṭhitassa ati upacāra sīmataḥ bahi ṭhitassa antar upacāra sīmāya pana dūre ṭhitassa api

original: labbhatiyeva. Senāsanaṃ gahetvāti vassūpanāyikadivase gahetvā. Sabbakālaṃ paṭibāhantīti
analyzed: labbhatiyā iva senāsanam gahetvā ati vassūpanāyika divase gahetvā sabba kālam paṭibāhanti iti

analyzed: catu māsa cayena utu kāle pi paṭibāhanti tīsu senāsana ggāhesu purimako ca pacchimako

original: cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā.
analyzed: cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā

original: Antarāmuttake ayaṃ vinicchayo – ekasmiṃ vihāre mahālābhasenāsanaṃ hoti. Senāsanasāmikā
analyzed: antarāmuttake ayam vinicchayaḥ ekasmin vihāre mahā lābha senāsanam hoti senāsana sāmikā

original: vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ sabbapaccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā pavāretvā gamanakāle
analyzed: vassūpagatam bhikkhum sabba paccayehi sakkaccam upaṭṭhahitvā pavāretvā gamana kāle

original: bahuṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ denti. Mahātherā dūratopi āgantvā vassūpanāyikadivase taṃ

original: gahetvā phāsuṃ vasitvā vutthavassā lābhaṃ gaṇhitvā pakkamanti. Āvāsikā “mayaṃ etthuppannaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā phāsum vasitvā vuttha vassāḥ lābham gaṇhitvā pakkamanti āvāsikāḥ mayam ettha uppannam

original: lābhaṃ na labhāma, niccaṃ āgantukamahātherāva labhanti, teyeva naṃ āgantvā paṭijaggissantī”ti
analyzed: lābham na labhāma niccam āgantuka mahā therāḥ ava labhanti teyeva nam āgantvā paṭijaggissanti iti

original: palujjantampi na olokenti. Bhagavā tassa paṭijagganatthaṃ “aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya
analyzed: palujjantam pi na olokenti bhagavā tassa paṭijaggana attham apa rajju gatāya pavāraṇāya

original: āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo”ti āha.
analyzed: āyatim vassa āvāsa atthāya antarāmuttakaḥ gāhetabbaḥ iti āha

original: Taṃ gāhentena saṅghatthero vattabbo – “bhante antarāmuttakasenāsanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
analyzed: tam gāhentena saṅgha ttheraḥ vattabbaḥ bhante antarāmuttaka senāsanam gaṇhatha ati

original: Sace gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ; no ce eteneva upāyena anutheraṃ ādiṃ katvā yo gaṇhāti, tassa
analyzed: sace gaṇhāti dātabbam no ce etena iva upāyena ādim katvā yaḥ gaṇhāti tassa

original: antamaso sāmaṇerassāpi dātabbaṃ. Tena taṃ senāsanaṃ aṭṭhamāse paṭijaggitabbaṃ. Chadanabhittibhūmīsu
analyzed: antamasaḥ sāmaṇerassa api dātabbam tena tat senāsanam aṭṭha māse paṭijaggitabbam chadana bhitti bhūmīsu

original: yaṃ kiñci khaṇḍaṃ vā phullaṃ vā hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ paṭisaṅkharitabbaṃ. Uddesaparipucchādīhi
analyzed: yam kiñci khaṇḍam vā phullam vā hoti tam sabbam paṭisaṅkharitabbam uddesa paripucchā ādīhi

original: divasaṃ khepetvā rattiṃ tattha vasitumpi vaṭṭati. Rattiṃ pariveṇe vasitvā tattha
analyzed: divasam khepetvā rattim tattha vasitum pi vaṭṭati rattim pariveṇe vasitvā tattha

original: divasaṃ khepetumpi vaṭṭati. Rattindivaṃ tattheva vasitumpi vaṭṭati. Utukāle āgatānaṃ

original: vuḍḍhānaṃ na paṭibāhitabbaṃ. Vassūpanāyikadivase pana sampatte sace saṅghatthero

original: gahetvā aṭṭhamāse ekena bhikkhunā paṭijaggita”nti vatvā na dātabbaṃ. Aṭṭhamāse paṭijaggakabhikkhusseva gahitaṃ hoti.

original: Yasmiṃ pana senāsane ekasaṃvacchare dvikkhattuṃ paccaye denti chamāsaccayena chamāsaccayena,
analyzed: yasmin pana senāsane eka saṃvacchare dvi kkhattum paccaye denti cha māsa cayena cha māsa cayena

analyzed: tam antarāmuttakam na gāhetabbam yasmin vā tikkhattum denti catu māsa ccayena catu māsa ccayena

original: yasmiṃ vā catukkhattuṃ denti temāsaccayena temāsaccayena, taṃ antarāmuttakaṃ na gāhetabbaṃ.
analyzed: yasmin vā catukkhattum denti temāsa cayena temāsa cayena tam antarāmuttakam na gāhetabbam

original: Paccayeneva hi taṃ paṭijagganaṃ labhissati. Yasmiṃ pana ekasaṃvacchare sakideva bahupaccaye
analyzed: paccayena iva hi tam paṭijagganam labhissati yasmin pana eka saṃvacchare sakid eva bahu paccaye

original: denti, etaṃ antarāmuttakaṃ gāhetabbanti. Ayaṃ tāva antovasse vassūpanāyikadivasena
analyzed: denti etam gāhetabbanti ayam tāva antovasse vassūpanāyika divasena

original: pāḷiyaṃ āgatasenāsanaggāhakathā.
analyzed: pāḷiyam āgata senāsana ggāha kathā

original: Ayaṃ pana senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hoti – utukāle ca vassāvāse ca. Tattha utukāle
analyzed: ayam pana senāsanaggāhaḥ nāma duvidhaḥ hoti utu kāle ca vassa āvāse ca tattha utu kāle

original: tāva keci āgantukā bhikkhū purebhattaṃ āgacchanti, keci pacchābhattaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ
analyzed: tāva keci āgantukā bhikkhū purebhattam āgacchanti keci pacchābhattam paṭhama yāmam

original: vā majjhimayāmaṃ vā pacchimayāmaṃ vā ye yadā āgacchanti, tesaṃ tadāva bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: vā majjhima yāmam vā pacchima yāmam vā ye yadā āgacchanti tesam tadā ava bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā

analyzed: atthi te tattha vasitvā pavāraṇāya āgantvā attanaḥ pattam vassāvāsikam gaṇhantu uti

original: yāgubhattaṃ nappahoti, sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasitvā āgacchatha, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ

analyzed: paccaya vasena gāhitam pana na labhati iti vadanti

analyzed: detha iti vicinitvā vara bhāgam sāmaṇerassa da tvā anubhāgaḥ thera āsane dātabbo sace

original: Upanandavatthukathā
analyzed: upananda vatthu kathā
