original: Āgataṃ. Tasmā mūlacchejjavasena avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgiyañca parivattanavasena pana vissajjentassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
analyzed: āgatam tasmā mūla chejja vasena avissajjiyam avebhaṅgiyam ca parivattana vasena pana vissajjentassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpatti iti evam ettha adhippāyaḥ veditabbo

original: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – idaṃ tāva pañcavidhampi cīvarapiṇḍapātabhesajjatthāya upanetuṃ
analyzed: tatra ayam anupubbi kathā idam tāva pañcavidham pi cīvara piṇḍapāta bhesajja tthāya upanetum

original: na vaṭṭati. Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍaṃ parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati thāvarena ca thāvaram garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍam parivattetum vaṭṭati

original: Thāvare pana khettaṃ vatthu taḷākaṃ mātikāti evarūpaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa vicāretuṃ
analyzed: thāvare pana khettam vatthu taḷākam mātikā ati evarūpam bhikkhu saṅghassa vicāretum

original: vā sampaṭicchituṃ vā adhivāsetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati, kappiyakārakeheva vicāritato kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: vā sampaṭicchitum vā adhivāsetum vā na vaṭṭati kappiya kārakehi iva kappiya bhaṇḍam

original: vaṭṭati. Ārāmena pana ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthunti imāni cattāri parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vaṭṭati ārāmena pana ārāmam ārāma vatthum vihāram vihāra vatthum ti imāni cattāri parivattetum vaṭṭati

original: Tatrāyaṃ parivattananayo – saṅghassa nāḷikerārāmo dūre hoti, kappiyakārakā vā bahutaraṃ
analyzed: tatra ayam parivattana nayaḥ saṅghassa nāḷikera ārāmaḥ dūre hoti kappiya kārakāḥ vā bahutaram

original: khādanti. Yampi na khādanti, tato sakaṭavetanaṃ datvā appameva haranti. Aññesaṃ pana
analyzed: khādanti yam pi na khādanti tatas sakaṭa vetanam da tvā appam eva haranti aññesam pana

original: tassa ārāmassa avidūragāmavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ vihārassa samīpe ārāmo hoti, te saṅghaṃ
analyzed: tassa ārāmassa avidūra gāma vāsīnam manussānam vihārassa samīpe ārāmaḥ hoti te saṅgham

original: upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena taṃ ārāmaṃ yācanti, saṅghena “ruccati saṅghassā”ti apaloketvā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena tam ārāmam yācanti saṅghena ruccati saṅghassa ati apaloketvā

original: sampaṭicchitabbo. Sacepi bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhasahassaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ pañca satāni,
analyzed: sampaṭicchitabbaḥ sace pi bhikkhūnam rukkha sahassam hoti manussānam pañca satāni

original: “tumhākaṃ ārāmo khuddako”ti na vattabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ khuddako, atha kho itarato
analyzed: tumhākam ārāmaḥ khuddakaḥ ti na vattabbam kiñcā api hi ayam khuddakaḥ atha kho itaratas

original: bahutaraṃ āyaṃ deti. Sacepi samakameva deti; evampi icchiticchitakkhaṇe paribhuñjituṃ
analyzed: bahutaram deti sace pi samakam eva deti evam pi icchiticchita khaṇe paribhuñjitum

original: sakkāti gahetabbameva. Sace pana manussānaṃ bahutarā rukkhā honti, “nanu tumhākaṃ
analyzed: sakkā ati gahetabbam eva sace pana manussānam bahutarāḥ rukkhāḥ honti nanu tumhākam

original: bahutarā rukkhā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “atirekaṃ amhākaṃ puññaṃ hotu, saṅghassa demā”ti
analyzed: bahutarā rukkhā ti vattabbam sace atirekam amhākam puññam hotu saṅghassa dema iti

original: vadanti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, manussānaṃ
analyzed: vadanti jānāpetvā sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati bhikkhūnam rukkhāḥ phala dhārinaḥ manussānam

original: rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, kiñcāpi na gaṇhanti, na cirena gaṇhissantīti sampaṭicchitabbameva.
analyzed: rukkhāḥ na tāva phalam gaṇhanti kiñcā api na gaṇhanti na cirena gaṇhissanti iti sampaṭicchitabbam eva

original: Manussānaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, bhikkhūnaṃ na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, “nanu tumhākaṃ
analyzed: manussānam rukkhāḥ phala dhārinaḥ bhikkhūnam na tāva phalam gaṇhanti nanu tumhākam

original: rukkhā phaladhārino”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “gaṇhatha, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti
analyzed: rukkhāḥ phala dhārino ti vattabbam sace gaṇhatha bhante amhākam puññam bhavissati iti

original: denti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati; evaṃ ārāmena ārāmo parivattetabbo. Eteneva
analyzed: denti jānāpetvā sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati evam ārāmena ārāmaḥ parivattetabbaḥ etena iva

original: nayena ārāmavatthupi vihāropi vihāravatthupi ārāmena parivattetabbaṃ. Ārāmavatthunā
analyzed: nayena ārāma vatthu pi vihāro pi vihāra vatthu pi ārāmena parivattetabbam ārāma vatthunā

original: ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaārāmavatthu vihāravihāravatthūni.
analyzed: ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāma ārāma vatthu vihāra vihāra vatthūni

original: Kathaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo? Saṅghassa antogāme gehaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ
analyzed: katham vihārena vihāraḥ parivattetabbaḥ saṅghassa antogāme geham hoti manussānam

original: vihāramajjhe pāsādo, ubhopi agghena samakā, sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ
analyzed: vihāra majjhe pāsādaḥ ubho pi agghena samakā sace manussā tena pāsādena tam geham

original: yācanti, sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ ce mahagghataraṃ gehaṃ hoti, “mahagghataraṃ
analyzed: yācanti sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati bhikkhūnam ce mahagghataram geham hoti mahagghataram

original: amhākaṃ geha”nti vutte “kiñcāpi mahagghataraṃ, pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ, na sakkā tattha
analyzed: amhākam geham ti vutte kiñca api mahagghataram pabbajitānam asāruppam na sakkā tattha

original: pabbajitehi vasituṃ, idaṃ pana sāruppaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti; evampi sampaṭicchituṃ
analyzed: pabbajitehi vasitum idam pana sāruppam gaṇhatha ati vadanti evam pi sampaṭicchitum

original: vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussānaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, “nanu tumhākaṃ gehaṃ mahaggha”nti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭati sace pana manussānam mahaggham hoti nanu tumhākam geham mahagghanti vattabbam

original: “Hotu, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: hotu bhante amhākam puññam bhavissati gaṇhatha ati vutte pana sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati

original: Evaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi
analyzed: evam vihārena vihāraḥ etena iva nayena vihāra vatthu pi ārāmaḥ pi ārāma vatthu pi

original: vihārena parivattetabbaṃ. Vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāravihāravatthuārāmaārāmavatthūni.
analyzed: vihārena parivattetabbam vihāra vatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāra vihāra vatthu ārāma ārāma vatthūni

original: Evaṃ tāva thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam tāva thāvarena thāvara parivattanam veditabbam

original: Garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu khuddakaṃ vā,
analyzed: garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍa parivattane pana mañca pīṭham mahantam vā hotu khuddakam vā

original: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ vā gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa
analyzed: antamasaḥ caturaṅgula pādakam vā gāma dārakehi paṃsu āgārakesu kīḷantehi katam pi saṅghassa

original: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva
analyzed: dinna kālato paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍam hoti sace pi rāja rāja mahāmatta ādayo eka ppahārena iva

original: mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā
analyzed: mañca satam vā mañca sahassam vā denti sabbe kappiya mañcā sampaṭicchitabbā sampaṭicchitvā

original: vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbā, puggalikavasena na
analyzed: vuḍḍha paṭipāṭiyā saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjatha ati dātabbā puggalika vasena na

original: dātabbā. Atirekamañce bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: dātabbā atireka mañce bhaṇḍāgāra ādīsu paññapetvā patta cīvaram nikkhipitum pi vaṭṭati

original: Bahisīmāya “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo. Tattha
analyzed: bahi sīmāya saṅghassa dema ati dinna mañcaḥ saṅgha ttherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo tattha

original: ce bahū mañcā honti, mañcena kammaṃ natthi; yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammaṃ atthi, tattha
analyzed: ce bahū mañcāḥ honti mañcena kammam natthi yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammam atthi tattha

original: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbo. Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena
analyzed: saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjatha ati dātabbaḥ mahagghena sata ghanakena vā sahassa ghanakena

original: vā satasahassagghanakena vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati, parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā sata sahassa gghanakena vā mañcena aññam mañca satam labhati parivattetvā gahetabbam

original: Na kevalaṃ mañcena mañcoyeva, ārāmaārāmavatthuvihāravihāravatthupīṭhabhisibimbohanānipi
analyzed: na kevalam mañcena ārāma ārāma vatthu vihāra vihāra vatthu pīṭha bhisi bimbohanāni pi

original: parivattetuṃ vaṭṭanti. Esa nayo pīṭhabhisibimbohanesupi. Etesu hi kappiyākapyiyaṃ
analyzed: parivattetum vaṭṭanti esa nayaḥ pīṭha bhisi bimbohanesu pi etesu hi kappiyākapyiyam

original: vuttanayameva. Tattha akappiyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ, kappiyaṃ saṅghikaparibhogena
analyzed: vutta nayam eva tattha akappiyam na paribhuñjitabbam kappiyam saṅghika paribhogena

original: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vā parivattetvā vuttavatthūni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbam akappiyam vā mahaggham kappiyam vā parivattetvā vutta vatthūni gahetabbāni

original: Agarubhaṇḍupagaṃ pana bhisibimbohanaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: agaru bhaṇḍu pagam pana bhisi bimbohanam nāma natthi

original: Lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni vā
analyzed: loha kumbhī loha bhāṇakam loha kaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni vā

original: antamaso pasatamattaudakagaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāniyeva. Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ
analyzed: antamasaḥ pasata matta audaka gaṇhanakāni iva lohavārakaḥ pana

original: yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādagaṇhanako bhājetabbo. Pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā
analyzed: yena kenacid kataḥ sīhaḷadīpe pāda gaṇhanakaḥ bhājetabbo pādo ca nāma magadha nāḷiyā

original: pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato adhikagaṇhanako garubhaṇḍaṃ. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni lohabhājanāni.
analyzed: gaṇhāti tatas adhika gaṇhanakaḥ imāni tāva āgatāni loha bhājanāni

original: Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatānipi bhiṅgārapaṭiggahauḷuṅkadabbikaṭacchupātitaṭṭakasarakasamuggaaṅgārakapalladhūmakaṭacchuādīni
analyzed: pāḷiyam pana anāgatāni api bhiṅgāra paṭiggaha oḷuṅka dabbi kaṭacchu pātitaṭṭaka saraka samugga aṅgāraka palla dhūmakaṭacchu ādīni

original: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni. Patto, ayathālakaṃ, tambalohathālakanti
analyzed: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni patto ayathālakam tamba loha thālakam ti

original: imāni pana bhājanīyāni. Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā
analyzed: imāni pana bhājanīyāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭā

original: vā vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi
analyzed: vā vaṭṭati puggalika paribhogena na vaṭṭati kaṃsa loha ādi bhājanam saṅghassa dinnam pi

original: hi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭati. “Gihivikaṭanihāreneva paribhuñjitabba”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: hi pārihāriyam na vaṭṭati gihi vikaṭa nihārena iva paribhuñjitabban ti mahā paccariyam vuttam

original: Ṭhapetvā pana bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe – añjanī, añjanisalākā,
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pana bhājana vikatim aññasmim pi kappiya loha bhaṇḍe añjanī añjani salākā

original: kaṇṇamalaharaṇī, sūci, paṇṇasūci, khuddako, pipphalako, khuddakaṃ, ārakaṇṭakaṃ, kuñcikā,
analyzed: kaṇṇamalaharaṇī sūci paṇṇasūci khuddako pipphalako khuddakam ārakaṇṭakam kuñcikā

original: tāḷaṃ, kattarayaṭṭhi vedhako, natthudānaṃ, bhindivālo, lohakūṭo, lohakuṭṭi, lohaguḷo,
analyzed: tāḷam kattarayaṭṭhi vedhakaḥ natthudānam bhindivālaḥ lohakūṭaḥ lohakuṭṭi lohaguḷaḥ

original: lohapiṇḍi, lohacakkalikaṃ, aññampi vippakatalohabhaṇḍaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Dhūmanettaphāladīparukkhadīpakapallakaolambakadīpaitthipurisatiracchānagatarūpakāni
analyzed: loha piṇḍi loha cakkalikam aññam pi vippa kata loha bhaṇḍam bhājanīyam dhūma netta phāla dīpa rukkha dīpaka pallaka olambaka dīpa aitthi purisa tiracchāna gata rūpakāni

original: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni, antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
analyzed: pana aññāni vā bhitti chadana kavāṭa ādīsu upanetabbāni antamasaḥ loha khilakam upādāya

original: sabbāni lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva honti, attanā laddhānipi pariharitvā puggalikaparibhogena
analyzed: sabbāni loha bhaṇḍāni garu bhaṇḍāni iva honti attanā laddhāni pi pariharitvā puggalika paribhogena

original: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti. Tipubhaṇḍepi
analyzed: na paribhuñjitabbāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti tipu bhaṇḍe pi

original: eseva nayo. Khīrapāsāṇamayāni taṭṭakasarakādīni garubhaṇḍāniyeva.
analyzed: khīra pāsāṇa mayāni taṭṭaka saraka ādīni

original: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādagaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suvaṇṇarajatahārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
analyzed: ghaṭakaḥ pana tela bhājanam vā pāda gaṇhanakataḥ atirekam eva garu bhaṇḍam suvaṇṇa rajata hārakūṭa jātiphalika bhājanāni

original: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti, pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā.
analyzed: gihi vikaṭāni pi na vaṭṭanti pagā iva saṅghika paribhogena vā puggalika paribhogena vā

original: Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: senāsana paribhoge pana āmāsam pi anāmāsam pi sabbam vaṭṭati

original: Vāsiādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā daṇḍakaṭṭhacchedanaṃ vā ucchutacchanaṃ vā aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
analyzed: vāsi ādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā daṇḍa kaṭṭha chedanam vā ucchutacchanam vā aññam mahākammam

original: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Tato mahattarī yena kenaci ākārena katā vāsi garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: kātum na sakkā ayam yena kenacid ākārena katā vā asi

original: Pharasu pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhanapharasupi garubhaṇḍameva. Kuṭhāriyaṃ pharasusadiso
analyzed: pana antamasaḥ vejjānam sirāvedhana pharasupi garu bhaṇḍam eva kuṭhāriyam pharasu sadisaḥ

original: eva vinicchayo. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
analyzed: eva vinicchayaḥ yā pana āvudha saṅkhepena katā ayam catur aṅgula mattaḥ api

original: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
analyzed: garu bhaṇḍam eva nikhādanam catur assa mukham vā hotu doṇi mukham vā vaṅkam vā ujukam

original: vā, antamaso sammuñjanidaṇḍakavedhanampi daṇḍabaddhaṃ ce, garubhaṇḍameva. Sammuñjanidaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
analyzed: vā daṇḍa baddham garubhaṇḍam eva sammuñjani daṇḍa khaṇanakam

original: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattameva, yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
analyzed: pana adaṇḍakam phala mattam eva yam sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharitum tam

original: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
analyzed: bhājanīyam sikharam pi nikhādanena iva saṅgahitam yehi manussehi vihāre vāsi ādīni

original: dinnāni honti, te ca ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte “detha no, bhante, upakaraṇe,
analyzed: dinnāni honti te ca ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte detha naḥ bhante upakaraṇe

original: puna pākatike karissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace āharanti, na vāretabbā; anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
analyzed: puna pākatike karissāma ati vadanti dātabbā sace āharanti na vāretabbā an āharantā api na codetabbā

original: Kammārataṭṭakāracundakāranaḷakāramaṇikārapattabandhakānaṃ adhikaraṇimuṭṭhikasaṇḍāsatulādīni
analyzed: kammāra taṭṭakāra cundakāra naḷakāra maṇikāra pattabandhakānam adhikaraṇi muṭṭhika saṇḍāsa tulā ādīni

original: sabbāni lohamayaupakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
analyzed: sabbāni loha maya upakaraṇāni saṅghe dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍāni tipu koṭṭaka suvaṇṇakāra cammakāra upakaraṇesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesupi tipucchedanasatthakaṃ, suvaṇṇakāraupakaraṇesu
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ tipu koṭṭaka upakaraṇesu pi tipu chedana satthakam suvaṇṇakāra upakaraṇesu

original: suvaṇṇacchedanasatthakaṃ, cammakāraupakaraṇesu kataparikammacammachiddanakaṃ khuddakasatthakanti
analyzed: suvaṇṇa chedana satthakam cammakāra upakaraṇesu kata parikamma camma chiddanakam khuddaka satthakanti

original: imāni bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni. Nahāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
analyzed: imāni bhājanīya bhaṇḍāni ṭhapetvā mahā kattarim mahā saṇḍāsam

original: mahāpipphalakañca sabbaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Mahākattariādīni garubhaṇḍāni.
analyzed: mahā pipphalakam ca sabbam bhājanīyam mahā kattari ādīni garu bhaṇḍāni

original: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
analyzed: valli ādīsu vetta valli ādikā yā kāci aḍḍha bāhu ppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tattha jātakā

original: vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitā garu bhaṇḍam hoti sā saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate sace atirekā

original: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati; arakkhitā pana garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā
analyzed: hoti puggalika kamme pi upanetum vaṭṭati arakkhitā pana garu bhaṇḍam eva na hoti suttamaka civāka nāḷikera hīra camma mayā

original: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā
analyzed: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikera hīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā eka vaṭṭā vā dvi vaṭṭā

original: vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā
analyzed: vā saṅghassa dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍam suttam pana avaṭṭetvā dinnam maka civāka nāḷikera hīrā

original: ca bhājanīyā. Yehi panetāni rajjukayottādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena
analyzed: ca bhājanīyāḥ dinnāni honti te karaṇīyena

original: harantā na vāretabbā.
analyzed: harantā na vāretabbā

original: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
analyzed: yaḥ koci antamasaḥ aṭṭhaṅgula sūci daṇḍa mattaḥ api saṅghassa dinnaḥ vā tattha jātakaḥ

original: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitaḥ garu bhaṇḍam saḥ api saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekaḥ puggalika kamme

original: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pādagaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi, upāhanadaṇḍako, chattadaṇḍo,
analyzed: dātum vaṭṭati pana upāhana daṇḍako chatta daṇḍo

original: chattasalākāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na
analyzed: chatta salākā ati idam ettha bhājanīya bhaṇḍam daḍḍha geha manussāḥ gaṇhitvā gacchantā na

original: vāretabbā. Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso
analyzed: vāretabbā rakkhita gopitam veḷum gaṇhantena samakam vā atirekam vā thāvaram antamasaḥ

original: taṃagghanakampi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo. Phātikammaṃ akatvā gaṇhantena tattheva
analyzed: phāti kammam katvā gahetabbaḥ phāti kammam a katvā gaṇhantena tattha eva

original: vaḷañjetabbo, gamanakāle saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Asatiyā gahetvā gatena
analyzed: vaḷañjetabbaḥ gamana kāle saṅghikā vāse ṭhapetvā gantabbam asatiyā gahetvā gatena

original: pahiṇitvā dātabbo. Desantaraṃ gatena sampattavihāre saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: pahiṇitvā dātabbaḥ desa antaram gatena sampatta vihāre saṅghikā vāse ṭhapetabbaḥ

original: Tiṇanti muñjaṃ pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃkiñci tiṇaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ natthi,
analyzed: tiṇanti muñjam pabbajam ca ṭhapetvā avasesam yaṃkiñci tiṇam yattha pana tiṇam natthi

original: tattha paṇṇehi chādenti; tasmā paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitaṃ. Iti muñjādīsu yaṃkiñci
analyzed: tattha paṇṇehi chādenti tasmā paṇṇam pi tiṇena iva saṅgahitam iti muñja ādīsu yaṃkiñcid

original: muṭṭhippamāṇampi tiṇaṃ tālapaṇṇādīsu ca ekaṃ paṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ
analyzed: tiṇam tāla paṇṇa ādīsu ca ekam paṇṇam pi saṅghassa dinnam vā tatthajātakam

original: vā bahārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthuto jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
analyzed: vā baha ārāme saṅghassa tiṇa vatthutaḥ jāta tiṇam vā rakkhita gopitam garu bhaṇḍam hoti

original: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daḍḍhagehamanussā
analyzed: tam pi saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekam puggalika kamme dātum vaṭṭati daḍḍha geha manussā

original: gahetvā gacchantā na vāretabbā. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: gahetvā gacchantā na vāretabbāḥ aṭṭha aṅgula ppamāṇaḥ api ritta potthakaḥ garu bhaṇḍam eva

original: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu
analyzed: mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañca vaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajju rasa kaṅguṭṭha silesa ādīsu

original: vā yaṃkiñci, dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālaphalapakkamattaṃ
analyzed: vā yaṃkiñci dullabha ṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnam tattha jātakam vā rakkhita gopitam tāla phala pakka mattam

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite atirekaṃ puggalikakamme
analyzed: garu bhaṇḍam hoti tam pi saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca niṭṭhite atirekam puggalika kamme

original: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Hiṅguhiṅgulakaharitālamanosilañjanāni pana bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni.
analyzed: dātum vaṭṭati hiṅgu hiṅgulaka haritāla manosilañjanāni pana bhājanīya bhaṇḍāni

original: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi dārubhaṇḍako dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa
analyzed: dāru bhaṇḍe yaḥ koci aṭṭhaṅgula sūci daṇḍa mattaḥ api dāru bhaṇḍakaḥ dāru dullabha ṭṭhāne saṅghassa

original: dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito, ayaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dinnaḥ vā tattha jātakaḥ vā rakkhita gopitaḥ ayam garu bhaṇḍam hoti iti kurundiyam vuttam

original: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbampi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikatiṃ dārubhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā
analyzed: mahā aṭṭhakathā ayam pana sabbam pi dāru veḷu camma pāsāṇa ādi vikatim dāru bhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā

original: “tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa āsandiko uppanno hotī”ti ito paṭṭhāya dārubhaṇḍavinicchayo vutto.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa āsandikaḥ uppannaḥ hoti iti itas paṭṭhāya dāru bhaṇḍa vinicchayaḥ vutto

original: Tatrāyaṃ atthuddhāro, āsandiko, sattaṅgo, bhaddapīṭhaṃ, pīṭhikā, eḷakapādakapīṭhaṃ,
analyzed: tatra ayam atthuddhāraḥ āsandikaḥ sattaṅgaḥ bhaddapīṭham pīṭhikā eḷakapādakapīṭham

original: āmalakavaṭṭakapīṭhaṃ, phalakaṃ, kocchaṃ, palālapīṭhakanti imesu tāva yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ
analyzed: āmalaka vaṭṭaka pīṭham phalakam koccham palāla pīṭhakanti imesu tāva yaṃkiñci khuddakam

original: vā hotu mahantaṃ vā, saṅghassa dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Palālapīṭhena cettha kadalipattādipīṭhānipi
analyzed: vā hotu mahantam vā saṅghassa dinnam garu bhaṇḍam hoti palāla pīṭhena ca ittha kadali patta ādi pīṭhāni pi

original: saṅgahitāni. Byagghacammaonaddhampi vāḷarūpaparikkhittaṃ, ratanaparisibbitaṃ, kocchakaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: saṅgahitāni vāḷa rūpa parikkhittam ratana parisibbitam kocchakam garubhaṇḍam eva

original: Vaṅkaphalakaṃ, dīghaphalakaṃ, cīvaradhovanaphalakaṃ, ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ, ghaṭṭanamuggaro,
analyzed: vaṅka phalakam dīgha phalakam cīvara dhovana phalakam ghaṭṭana phalakam ghaṭṭana muggaraḥ

original: dantakaṭṭhacchedanagaṇṭhikā, daṇḍamuggaro, ambaṇaṃ, rajanadoṇi, udakapaṭicchako,
analyzed: danta kaṭṭha chedana gaṇṭhikā daṇḍamuggaraḥ ambaṇam rajana doṇi udaka paṭicchakaḥ

original: dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo, mañjūsā, pādagaṇhanakato
analyzed: dāru mayaḥ vā danta mayaḥ vā veḷu mayaḥ vā sa pādakaḥ api a pādakaḥ api sa muggaḥ mañjūsā pāda gaṇhana kato

original: atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo, udakadoṇi, udakakaṭāhaṃ, uḷuṅko, kaṭacchu, pānīyasarāvaṃ,
analyzed: atireka ppamāṇaḥ karaṇḍo udaka doṇi udaka kaṭāham uḷuṅkaḥ kaṭacchu pānīya sarāvam

original: pānīyasaṅkhoti etesupi yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīyaṃ,
analyzed: pānīya saṅkhaḥ ti saṅghe dinnam garu bhaṇḍam saṅkhathālakam bhājanīyam

original: tathā dārumayo udakatumbo.
analyzed: tathā dāru mayaḥ udaka tumbaḥ

original: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Ādhārako
analyzed: pāda kathalika maṇḍalam dāru mayam vā hotu coḷa paṇṇa ādi mayam vā sabbam garu bhaṇḍam ādhārakaḥ

original: pattapidhānaṃ, tālavaṇṭaṃ, bījanī, caṅkoṭakaṃ, pacchi, yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti
analyzed: patta pidhānam tālavaṇṭam bījanī caṅkoṭakam pacchi yaṭṭhi sammuñjanī muṭṭhi sammuñjanī iti

original: etesupi yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: etesu pi yaṃkiñci khuddakam vā mahantam vā dāru veḷu paṇṇa camma ādīsu yena kenacid katam garu bhaṇḍam eva

original: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā yaṃkiñci gehasambhārarūpaṃ,
analyzed: thambha tulā sopāna phalaka ādīsu dāru mayam vā pāsāṇa mayam vā yaṃkiñci geha sambhāra rūpam

original: yo koci kaṭasārako, yaṃkiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci akappiyacammaṃ, sabbaṃ saṅghe
analyzed: yaḥ koci kaṭasārakaḥ yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇam yaṃ kiñci a kappiya cammam sabbam saṅghe

original: dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakacammaṃ pana paccattharaṇagatikaṃ
analyzed: dinnam garu bhaṇḍam bhūmattharaṇam kātum vaṭṭati eḷaka cammam pana paccattharaṇa gatikam

original: hoti, tampi garubhaṇḍameva. Kappiyacammāni bhājanīyāni. Kurundiyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: hoti tam pi garubhaṇḍam eva kappiya cammāni bhājanīyāni kurundiyam pana sabbam mañca ppamāṇam

original: cammaṃ garubhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cammam garubhaṇḍam ti vuttam

original: Udukkhalaṃ, musalaṃ, suppaṃ, nisadaṃ, nisadapoto, pāsāṇadoṇi, pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ, turivemabhastādi
analyzed: udukkhalam musalam suppam nisadam nisada poto pāsāṇa doṇi pāsāṇa kaṭāham turi vema bhasta ādi

original: sabbaṃ pesakārādibhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ cakkayuttakayānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: sabbam pesakāra ādi bhaṇḍam sabbam kasi bhaṇḍam sabbam cakkayuttaka yānam garu bhaṇḍam eva

original: Mañcapādo, mañcaaṭanī, pīṭhapādo, pīṭhaaṭanī, vāsipharasuādīnaṃ daṇḍāti etesu yaṃkiñci
analyzed: mañca pādaḥ mañca aṭanī pīṭha pādaḥ pīṭha aṭanī etesu yaṃkiñcid

original: vippakatatacchanakammaṃ aniṭṭhitameva bhājanīyaṃ, tacchitamaṭṭhaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: aniṭṭhitam eva bhājanīyam pana garu bhaṇḍam

original: hoti. Anuññātavāsiyā pana daṇḍo chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇisahitaṃ
analyzed: hoti anuññāta vāsiyā pana daṇḍaḥ chattam uṭṭhi paṇṇam kattara yaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇi sahitam

original: dhammakaraṇo pādagaṇhanakato anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo lābukatumbaṃ
analyzed: dhamma karaṇo pāda gaṇhanakataḥ anatirittam āmalaka tumbam āmalaka ghaṭaḥ lābuka tumbam

original: lābughaṭo visāṇakatumbanti sabbametaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tato mahantataraṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: lābu ghaṭaḥ visāṇaka tumbanti sabbam etam bhājanīyam tatas mahantataram garubhaṇḍam

original: Hatthidanto vā yaṃkiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathājātameva bhājanīyaṃ, tehi katamañcapādādīsu
analyzed: hatthi dantaḥ vā yaṃ kiñci visāṇam vā a tacchitam yathā jātam eva bhājanīyam tehi

original: purimasadisoyeva vinicchayo. Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako añjanakaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā
analyzed: purima sadisaḥ yeva vinicchayaḥ tad śita niṭṭhitaḥ api hiṅgu karaṇḍakaḥ añjana karaṇḍakaḥ gaṇṭhikā

original: vidho añjanī añjanisalākā udakapuñchanīti idaṃ sabbaṃ bhājanīyameva.
analyzed: vidho añjanī añjani salākā udaka puñchanī iti idam sabbam bhājanīyam eva

original: Mattikābhaṇḍe sabbaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ghaṭapiṭharādikulālabhājanaṃ pattakaṭāhaṃ
analyzed: mattikā bhaṇḍe sabbam manussānam upabhoga paribhogam ghaṭa piṭhara ādi kulāla bhājanam patta kaṭāham

original: aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ dhūmadānakaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā
analyzed: aṅgāra kaṭāham dhūma dānakam dīpa rukkhakaḥ dīpaka pallikā caya niṭṭhakā chada niṭṭhakā

original: thūpikāti saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ, pādagaṇhanakato anatirittappamāṇo
analyzed: thūpikā ati saṅghassa dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍam pāda gaṇhanakataḥ an atiritta ppamāṇaḥ

original: pana ghaṭako pattaṃ thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Yathā
analyzed: pana ghaṭakaḥ pattam thālakam kañcanakaḥ kuṇḍikā iti idam ettha bhājanīya bhaṇḍam yathā

original: ca mattikābhaṇḍe; evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti ayamettha anupubbikathā.
analyzed: ca mattikā bhaṇḍe evam loha bhaṇḍe pi kuṇḍikā bhājanīya koṭṭhāsam eva bhajati iti ayam ettha anupubbi kathā

original: Avissajjiyavatthukathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: avissajjiya vatthu kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Navakammadānakathā
analyzed: nava kamma dāna kathā

original: 323. Bhaṇḍikāṭṭhapanamattenāti dvārabāhānaṃ upari kapotabhaṇḍikayojanamattena. Paribhaṇḍakaraṇamattenāti
analyzed: bhaṇḍika aṭṭhapana mattena ati upari kapota bhaṇḍika yojana mattena paribhaṇḍa karaṇa mattena ati

original: gomayaparibhaṇḍakasāvaparibhaṇḍakaraṇamattena. Dhūmakālikanti idaṃ yāvassa citakadhūmo
analyzed: gomaya paribhaṇḍaka sāva paribhaṇḍa karaṇa mattena dhūma kālikam idam yāvassa citaka dhūmaḥ

original: na paññāyati, tāva ayaṃ vihāro etassevāti evaṃ dhūmakāle apaloketvā katapariyositaṃ
analyzed: na paññāyati tāva ayam vihāraḥ etassa iva ati evam dhūma kāle apaloketvā kata pariyositam

original: vihāraṃ denti. Vippakatanti ettha vippakato nāma yāva gopānasiyo na ārohanti. Gopānasīsu
analyzed: vihāram denti vippakatanti ettha vippakataḥ nāma yāva gopānasiyaḥ na ārohanti gopānasīsu

original: pana āruḷhāsu bahukato nāma hoti, tasmā tato paṭṭhāya na dātabbo, kiñcideva samādapetvā
analyzed: pana āruḷhāsu bahukataḥ nāma hoti tasmā tatas paṭṭhāya na dātabbo kiñcid eva samādapetvā

original: kāressati. Khuddake vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikanti kammaṃ oloketvā catuhatthavihāre
analyzed: kāressati khuddake vihāre kammaṃ oloketvā chappañcavassikanti kammaṃ oloketvā catuhattha vihāre

original: catuvassikaṃ, pañcahatthe pañcavassikaṃ, chahatthe chavassikaṃ dātabbaṃ. Aḍḍhayogo
analyzed: catu vassikam pañca hatthe pañca vassikam cha hatthe cha vassikam dātabbam aḍḍha yogo

original: pana yasmā sattaṭṭhahattho hoti, tasmā ettha “sattaṭṭhavassika”nti vuttaṃ. Sace pana
analyzed: pana yasmā satta ṭṭha hatthaḥ hoti tasmā ettha satta ṭṭhavassikan ti vuttam sace pana

original: so navahattho hoti navavassikampi dātabbaṃ. Mahallake pana dasahatthe ekādasahatthe
analyzed: saḥ nava hatthaḥ hoti nava vassikam pi dātabbam mahallake pana dasa hatthe ekādasa hatthe

original: vihāre vā pāsāde vā dasavassikaṃ vā ekādasavassikaṃ vā dātabbaṃ. Dvādasahatthe pana
analyzed: vihāre vā pāsāde vā dasa vassikam vā ekādasa vassikam vā dātabbam dvādasa hatthe pana

original: tato adhike vā lohapāsādasadisepi dvādasavassikameva dātabbaṃ, na tato uttari.
analyzed: tatas adhike vā loha pāsāda sadise pi dvādasa vassikam eva dātabbam na tatas uttari

original: Navakammiko bhikkhu antovasse taṃ āvāsaṃ labhati, utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhati.
analyzed: nava kammikaḥ bhikkhu antovasse tam āvāsam labhati utu kāle paṭibāhitum na labhati

original: Sace so āvāso jīrati, āvāsasāmikassa vā tassa vaṃse uppannassa vā kassaci kathetabbaṃ
analyzed: sace saḥ āvāsaḥ jīrati āvāsa sāmikassa vā tassa vaṃse uppannassa vā kassaci kathetabbam

original: – “āvāso te nassati, jaggatha etaṃ āvāsa”nti. Sace so na sakkoti, bhikkhūhi ñātī
analyzed: āvāsaḥ te nassati jaggatha etam āvāsanti sace saḥ na sakkoti bhikkhūhi ñātī

original: vā upaṭṭhāke vā samādapetvā jaggitabbo. Sace tepi na sakkonti, saṅghikena paccayena
analyzed: vā upaṭṭhāke vā samādapetvā jaggitabbaḥ sace te pi na sakkonti saṅghikena paccayena

original: jaggitabbo. Tasmimpi asati ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā avasesā jaggitabbā. Bahū vissajjetvā
analyzed: jaggitabbaḥ tasmin pi asati ekam āvāsam vissajjetvā avasesāḥ jaggitabbāḥ bahū vissajjetvā

original: ekaṃ saṇṭhāpetumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
analyzed: ekam saṇṭhāpetum pi vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Dubbhikkhe bhikkhūsu pakkantesu sabbe āvāsā nassanti, tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā
analyzed: dubbhikkhe bhikkhūsu pakkantesu sabbe āvāsāḥ nassanti tasmai ekam vā dve vā tayaḥ vā

original: āvāse vissajjetvā tato yāgubhattacīvarādīni paribhuñjantehi sesāvāsā jaggitabbāyeva.
analyzed: āvāse vissajjetvā tatas yāgu bhatta cīvara ādīni paribhuñjantehi sesa āvāsāḥ jaggitabbāya eva

original: Kurundiyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “saṅghike paccaye asati eko bhikkhu ‘tuyhaṃ ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: kurundiyam pana vuttam saṅghike paccaye asati ekaḥ bhikkhu tuyham ekam mañcaṭṭhānam

original: gahetvā jaggāhī’ti vattabbo. Sace bahutaraṃ icchati, tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā
analyzed: gahetvā jaggāhi iti vattabbaḥ sace bahutaram icchati ti bhāgam vā upaḍḍha bhāgam vā

original: datvāpi jaggāpetabbaṃ. Atha ‘thambhamattamevettha avasiṭṭhaṃ, bahukammaṃ kātabba’nti
analyzed: datvā api jaggāpetabbam atha thambha mattam eva itthā avasiṭṭham bahu kammam kātabbanti

original: na icchati, ‘tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jagga; evampi hi saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: na icchati tuyham puggalikam eva katvā jagge evam pi hi saṅghassa bhaṇḍaka ṭṭhapana ṭṭhānam

original: navakānañca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ labhissatī’ti jaggāpetabbo. Evaṃ jaggito pana tasmiṃ jīvante
analyzed: navakānam ca vasana ṭṭhānam labhissati iti jaggāpetabbo evam jaggitaḥ pana tasmim jīvante

original: puggaliko hoti, mate saṅghikoyeva. Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hoti, kammaṃ oloketvā
analyzed: puggalikaḥ hoti mate sace saddhivihārikānam dātu kāmo hoti kammaṃ oloketvā

original: tibhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā puggalikaṃ katvā jaggāpetabbo. Evañhi saddhivihārikānaṃ dātuṃ
analyzed: ti bhāgam vā upaḍḍham vā puggalikam katvā jaggāpetabbaḥ evam hi saddhivihārikānam dātum

original: labhati. Evaṃ jagganake pana asati ‘ekaṃ āvāsaṃ vissajjetvā’tiādinā nayena jaggāpetabbo”ti.
analyzed: labhati evam jagganake pana asati ekam āvāsam vissajjetvā ati ādinā nayena jaggāpetabbaḥ ti

original: Idampi ca aññaṃ tattheva vuttaṃ – dve bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ bhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikaṃ
analyzed: idam api ca aññam tattha eva vuttam dve bhikkhū saṅghikam bhūmim gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikam

original: senāsanaṃ karonti. Yena sā bhūmi paṭhamaṃ gahitā, so sāmī. Ubhopi puggalikaṃ karonti,
analyzed: senāsanam karonti yena sā bhūmi paṭhamam gahitā saḥ sāmī karonti

original: soyeva sāmī. So saṅghikaṃ karoti, itaro puggalikaṃ karoti, aññaṃ ce bahuṃ senāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ yā iva sāmī so saṅghikam karoti itaraḥ puggalikam karoti aññam ce bahum senāsana ṭṭhānam

original: atthi, puggalikaṃ karontopi na vāretabbo. Aññasmiṃ pana tādise paṭirūpe ṭhāne asati
analyzed: atthi puggalikam karontaḥ api na vāretabbaḥ aññasmin pana tādise paṭirūpe ṭhāne asati

original: taṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghikaṃ karonteneva kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tassa tattha vayakammaṃ
analyzed: tam paṭibāhitvā saṅghikam karontena iva kātabbam yam pana tassa tattha vaya kammam

original: kataṃ, taṃ dātabbaṃ. Sace pana katāvāse vā āvāsakaraṇaṭṭhāne vā chāyūpagaphalūpagarukkhā
analyzed: katam tat dātabbam sace pana kata āvāse vā āvāsa karaṇa ṭṭhāne vā chāyūpaga phalūpaga rukkhā

original: honti, apaloketvā hāretabbā. Puggalikā ce honti, sāmikā āpucchitabbā; no ce denti,
analyzed: honti apaloketvā hāretabbā puggalikā ce honti sāmikā āpucchitabbā no ce denti

original: yāvatatiyaṃ āpucchitvā “rukkhaagghanakamūlaṃ dassāmā”ti hāretabbā.
analyzed: yāvatatiyam āpucchitvā rukkha agghanaka mūlam dassāma ati hāretabbā

original: Yo pana saṅghikavallimattampi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā
analyzed: yaḥ pana saṅghika valli mattam pi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā

original: puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti, upaḍḍhaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti; upaḍḍhaṃ puggalikaṃ. Pāsādo ce
analyzed: puggalika vihāram kāreti upaḍḍham saṅghikam hoti upaḍḍham puggalikam pāsādaḥ ce

original: hoti, heṭṭhāpāsādo saṅghiko; upari puggaliko. Sace so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ icchati, tassa
analyzed: hoti heṭṭhā pāsādaḥ saṅghikaḥ upari puggaliko sace saḥ heṭṭhā pāsādam icchati tassa

original: hoti. Atha heṭṭhā ca upari ca icchati, ubhayattha upaḍḍhaṃ labhati. Dve senāsanāni
analyzed: hoti atha heṭṭhā ca upari ca icchati ubhayattha upaḍḍham labhati dve senāsanāni

original: kāreti – ekaṃ saṅghikaṃ, ekaṃ puggalikaṃ. Sace vihāre uṭṭhitena dabbasambhārena kāreti,
analyzed: kāreti ekam saṅghikam ekam puggalikam sace vihāre uṭṭhitena dabba sambhārena kāreti

original: tatiyabhāgaṃ labhati. Sace akataṭṭhāne cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vā karoti, bahikuṭṭe upaḍḍhaṃ
analyzed: tatiya bhāgam labhati sace a kata ṭṭhāne cayam vā pamukham vā karoti bahi kuṭṭe upaḍḍham

original: saṅghassa, upaḍḍhaṃ tassa. Atha mahantaṃ visamaṃ pūretvā apade padaṃ dassetvā kataṃ
analyzed: saṅghassa upaḍḍham tassa atha mahantam visamam pūretvā a pade padam dassetvā katam

original: hoti, anissaro tattha saṅgho.
analyzed: hoti anissaraḥ tattha saṅghaḥ

original: Ekaṃ varaseyyanti ettha navakammadānaṭṭhāne vā vassaggena pattaṭṭhāne vā yaṃ icchati, taṃ ekaṃ varaseyyaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
analyzed: ekam varaseyyam ti ettha nava kamma dāna ṭhāne vā vassaggena patta ṭṭhāne vā yam icchati tam ekam varaseyyam anujānāmi iti attho

original: Pariyosite pakkamati tassevetanti puna āgantvā vasantassa antovassaṃ tasseva taṃ; anāgacchantassa pana saddhivihārikādayo gahetuṃ na labhanti.
analyzed: pariyosite pakkamati punar āgantvā vasantassa antovassam tassa iva tam an āgacchantassa pana saddhivihārika ādayaḥ gahetum na labhanti

original: Navakammadānakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nava kamma dāna kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Aññatrapaṭibhogapaṭikkhepādikathā
analyzed: aññatra paṭibhoga paṭikkhepa ādi kathā

original: 324. Nātiharantīti aññatra haritvā na paribhuñjanti. Guttatthāyāti yaṃ tattha mañcapīṭhādi,
analyzed: na atiharanti iti aññatra haritvā na paribhuñjanti yam mañca pīṭha ādi

original: tassa guttatthāya, taṃ aññatra harituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Tasmā taṃ aññatra haritvā
analyzed: tassa gutta tthāya tam aññatra haritum anujānāmi iti tasmā tam aññatra haritvā

original: saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Sace arogaṃ
analyzed: saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭham su naṭṭham jiṇṇam su jiṇṇam sace arogam

original: tasmiṃ vihāre paṭisaṅkhate puna pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ. Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjato
analyzed: tasmin vihāre paṭisaṅkhate puna pākatikam kātabbam puggalika paribhogena paribhuñjataḥ

original: naṭṭhaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā gīvā hoti, tasmiṃ paṭisaṅkhate dātabbameva. Sace tato gopānasiādīni
analyzed: naṭṭham vā jiṇṇam vā gīvā hoti tasmin paṭisaṅkhate dātabbam eva sace tatas gopānasi ādīni

original: gahetvā aññasmiṃ saṅghikāvāse yojenti, suyojitāni. Puggalikāvāse yojentehi pana mūlaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā aññasmin saṅghika āvāse yojenti su yojitāni puggalika āvāse yojentehi pana mūlam

original: vā dātabbaṃ, paṭipākatikaṃ vā kātabbaṃ chaḍḍitavihārato mañcapīṭhādīni theyyacittena
analyzed: vā dātabbam paṭipākatikam vā kātabbam chaḍḍita vihārataḥ mañca pīṭha ādīni theyya cittena

original: gaṇhanto uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Puna āvāsikakāle dassāmīti gahetvā saṅghikaparibhogena
analyzed: gaṇhantaḥ uddhāreya iva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo puna āvāsika kāle dassāmi iti gahetvā saṅghika paribhogena

original: paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ sunaṭṭhaṃ, jiṇṇaṃ sujiṇṇaṃ. Arogañce pākatikaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: paribhuñjantassa naṭṭham su naṭṭham jiṇṇam su jiṇṇam arogañce pākatikam kātabbaṃ

original: Puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭhaṃ gīvā hoti. Tato dvāravātapānādīni saṅghikāvāse
analyzed: puggalika paribhogena paribhuñjantassa naṭṭham gīvā hoti tatas dvāra vāta pāna ādīni saṅghika āvāse

original: vā puggalikāvāse vā yojitāni paṭidātabbāniyeva.
analyzed: vā puggalikā vāse vā yojitāni paṭidātabbāni iva

original: Phātikammatthāyāti vaḍḍhikammatthāya. Phātikammañcettha samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā agghanakaṃ mañcapīṭhādisenāsanameva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: phāti kamma atthāya ati vaḍḍhi kamma atthāya phāti kammam ca ittha samakam vā atirekam vā agghanakam mañca pīṭha ādi senāsanam eva vaṭṭati

original: Cakkalikanti kambalādīhi veṭhetvā katacakkalikaṃ. Allehi pādehīti yehi akkantaṭṭhāne
analyzed: cakkalikan ti kambala ādīhi veṭhetvā kata cakkalikam allehi pādehi iti yehi akkanta ṭṭhāne

original: udakaṃ paññāyati, evarūpehi pādehi paribhaṇḍakatabhūmi vā senāsanaṃ vā na akkamitabbaṃ.
analyzed: udakam paññāyati evarūpehi pādehi paribhaṇḍakata bhūmi vā senāsanam vā na akkamitabbam

original: Sace pana udakasinehamattameva paññāyati, na udakaṃ, vaṭṭati. Pādapuñchaniṃ pana
analyzed: sace pana udaka sineha mattam eva paññāyati na udakam vaṭṭati pāda puñchanim pana

original: allapādehipi akkamituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Saupāhanena dhotapādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhāneyeva na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: alla pādehi pi akkamitum vaṭṭatiyā iva sa upāhanena dhota pādehi na vaṭṭati

original: Coḷakena paliveṭhetunti sudhābhūmiyaṃ vā paribhaṇḍabhūmiyaṃ vā sace taṭṭikā vā kaṭasārako
analyzed: coḷakena sudhā bhūmiyam vā paribhaṇḍa bhūmiyam vā sace vā

original: vā natthi, coḷakena pādā veṭhetabbā, tasmiṃ asati paṇṇampi attharituṃ vaṭṭati. Kiñci
analyzed: vā natthi coḷakena pādā veṭhetabbā tasmin asati paṇṇam pi attharitum vaṭṭati kiñci

original: anattharitvā ṭhapentassa pana dukkaṭaṃ. Yadi pana tattha nevāsikā anatthatāyapi bhūmiyā
analyzed: an attharitvā ṭhapentassa pana dukkaṭam yadi pana tattha nevāsikāḥ bhūmiyā

original: ṭhapenti, adhotapādehipi vaḷañjenti, tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vaḷañjenti tathā iva vaḷañjetum vaṭṭati

original: Na bhikkhave parikammakatā bhittīti setabhitti vā cittakammakatā vā. Na kevalañca
analyzed: na bhikkhave parikammaka tā bhitti iti seta bhitti vā citta kammaka tā vā na kevalam ca

original: bhittimeva, dvārampi vātapānampi apassenaphalakampi pāsāṇatthambhampi rukkhatthambhampi
analyzed: bhittim eva dvāram pi vāta pānam pi apassena phalakam pi pāsāṇa tthambham pi rukkha tthambham pi

original: cīvarena vā kenaci vā appaṭicchādetvā apassayituṃ na labbhatiyeva.
analyzed: cīvarena vā kenaci vā a paṭicchādetvā a passayitum na labbhatiyā iva

original: Dhotapādakāti dhotapādakā hutvā dhotehi pādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhāne nipajjituṃ kukkuccāyanti.
analyzed: dhota pādakā ati dhota pādakā hutvā dhotehi pādehi akkamitabba ṭṭhāne nipajjitum kukkuccāyanti

original: “Dhotapādake”tipi pāṭho. Dhotehi pādehi akkamitabbaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paccattharitvāti
analyzed: dhota pādaka itipi pāṭhaḥ dhotehi pādehi akkamitabba ṭṭhānassa etam adhivacanam paccattharitvā iti

original: paribhaṇḍakataṃ bhūmiṃ vā bhūmattharaṇasenāsanaṃ vā saṅghikamañcapīṭhaṃ vā attano
analyzed: paribhaṇḍakatam bhūmim vā bhūmattharaṇa senāsanam vā saṅghika mañca pīṭham vā

original: santakena paccattharaṇena paccattharitvāva nipajjitabbaṃ. Sace niddāyatopi paccattharaṇe
analyzed: santakena paccattharaṇena paccattharitvā ava nipajjitabbam sace niddāyataḥ api paccattharaṇe

original: saṅkuṭite koci sarīrāvayavo mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā phusati, āpattiyeva. Lomesu pana
analyzed: saṅkuṭite koci sarīra avayavaḥ mañcam vā pīṭham vā phusati āpattiyā iva lomesu pana

original: lomagaṇanāya āpattiyeva. Paribhogasīsena apassayantassāpi eseva nayo. Hatthatalapādatalehi
analyzed: loma gaṇanāya āpattiyā iva paribhoga sīsena a passayantassa api esa iva nayaḥ hattha tala pāda talehi

original: pana phusituṃ vā akkamituṃ vā vaṭṭati. Mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharantassa kāye paṭihaññati, anāpatti.
analyzed: pana phusitum vā akkamitum vā vaṭṭati mañca pīṭham nīharantassa kāye paṭihaññati anāpatti

original: Aññatraparibhogapaṭikkhepādikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aññatra paribhoga paṭikkhepa ādi kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Saṅghabhattādianujānanakathā
analyzed: saṅgha bhatta ādi anujānana kathā

original: 325. Na sakkonti saṅghabhattaṃ kātunti sakalassa saṅghassa bhattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
analyzed: na sakkonti saṅgha bhattam kātunti sakalassa saṅghassa bhattam kātum na sakkonti

original: Uddesabhattantiādīsu “ekaṃ vā dve vā…pe… dasa vā bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”ti
analyzed: uddesa bhatta nti ādīsu ekam vā dve vāpe dasa vā bhikkhū saṅghataḥ uddisitvā detha ati

original: evaṃ uddesena laddhabhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Apare tatheva bhikkhū paricchinditvā
analyzed: evam uddesena laddha bhikkhūnam bhattam kātum icchanti apare tathā iva bhikkhū paricchinditvā

original: nimantetvā tesaṃ bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Apare salākāyo chinditvā, apare pakkhikaṃ
analyzed: nimantetvā tesam bhattam kātum icchanti apare salākāyaḥ chinditvā apare pakkhikam

original: uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikanti evaṃ niyāmetvā, ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā…pe… dasannaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: uposathikam pāṭipadikam ti evam niyāmetvā ekassa vā dvinnam vā āpe dasannam vā bhikkhūnam

original: bhattaṃ kātuṃ icchanti. Iti etāni bhattāni uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ
analyzed: bhattam kātum icchanti iti etāni bhattāni uddesa bhattam nimantananti imam vohāram

original: pattāni. Yasmā pana te sacepi dubbhikkhe na sakkonti, subhikkhe jāte pana puna saṅghabhattaṃ
analyzed: pattāni yasmā pana te sace pi dubbhikkhe na sakkonti subhikkhe jāte pana puna saṅgha bhattam

original: kātuṃ sakkhissanti, tasmā bhagavā tampi anto katvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghabhattaṃ
analyzed: kātum sakkhissanti tasmai bhagavā tam pi antar katvā anujānāmi bhikkhave saṅgha bhattam

original: uddesabhatta”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: uddesa bhattanti ādim āha

original: piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Iti imāni ca tīṇi āgantukabhattādīni ca cattārīti satta,
analyzed: piṇḍapātikānam vaṭṭati iti imāni ca tīṇi āgantuka bhatta ādīni ca cattāri iti satta

original: tāni saṅghabhattādīhi saha cuddasa bhattāni honti.
analyzed: tāni saṅgha bhatta ādīhi saha cuddasa bhattāni honti

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārabhattaṃ, aṭṭhakabhattaṃ, catukkabhattaṃ, guḷhakabhattanti
analyzed: pana vihāra bhattam aṭṭhaka bhattam catukka bhattam guḷhaka bhattanti

original: aññānipi cattāri bhattāni vuttāni. Tattha vihārabhattaṃ nāma vihāre tatruppādabhattaṃ,
analyzed: aññāni pi cattāri bhattāni vuttāni tattha vihāra bhattam nāma vihāre tatruppāda bhattam

original: taṃ saṅghabhattena gahitaṃ. Taṃ pana tissamahāvihāracittalapabbatādīsu paṭisambhidāpattehi
analyzed: tam saṅgha bhattena gahitam tam pana tissa mahāvihāra cittala pabbata ādīsu paṭisambhidā pattehi

original: khīṇāsavehi yathā piṇḍapātikānampi sakkā hoti paribhuñjituṃ, tathā paṭiggahitattā
analyzed: khīṇa āsavehi yathā piṇḍapātikānam pi sakkā hoti paribhuñjitum tathā paṭiggahita ttā

original: tādisesu ṭhānesu piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. “Aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dema, catunnaṃ demā”ti
analyzed: tādisesu ṭhānesu piṇḍapātikānam pi vaṭṭati aṭṭhannam bhikkhūnam dema catunnam dema ati

original: evaṃ dinnaṃ pana aṭṭhakabhattañceva catukkabhattañca; tampi bhikkhāvacanena dinnaṃ
analyzed: evam dinnam pana aṭṭhaka bhattam ca iva catukka bhattam ca tat pi bhikkhā vacanena dinnam

original: piṇḍapātikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Mahābhisaṅkhārikena atirasakapūvena pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā
analyzed: piṇḍapātikānam vaṭṭati mahābhisaṅkhārikena atirasaka pūvena pattam pūretvā thaketvā

original: dinnaṃ guḷhakabhattaṃ nāma. Imāni tīṇi salākabhattagatikāneva.
analyzed: dinnam guḷhaka bhattam nāma imāni tīṇi

original: Aparampi guḷakabhattaṃ nāma atthi, idhekacce manussā mahādhammasavanañca vihārapūjañca
analyzed: aparam pi guḷakabhattam nāma atthi idha ekacce manussāḥ mahā dhamma savanañca vihāra pūjañca

original: kāretvā sakalasaṅghassa dātuṃ na sakkomāti, “dve tīṇi bhikkhusatāni amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ
analyzed: kāretvā sakala saṅghassa dātum na sakkoma ati dve tīṇi bhikkhu satāni amhākam bhikkham

original: gaṇhantū”ti bhikkhuparicchedajānanatthaṃ guḷake denti, idaṃ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: gaṇhantu uti bhikkhu pariccheda jānana attham guḷake denti idam piṇḍapātikānam pi vaṭṭati

original: Iti cīvarakkhandhake cīvarabhājanīyaṃ, imasmiṃ pana senāsanakkhandhake senāsanabhājanīyañceva
analyzed: iti cīvara kkhandhake cīvara bhājanīyam imasmin pana senāsana kkhandhake senāsana bhājanīyam ca iva

original: piṇḍapātabhājanīyañca vuttaṃ.
analyzed: piṇḍapāta bhājanīyañca vuttam

original: Gilānapaccayabhājanīyaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – sappiādīsu bhesajjesu rājarājamahāmattā
analyzed: gilāna paccaya bhājanīyam pana evam veditabbam sappi ādīsu bhesajjesu rāja rāja mahāmattā

original: sappissa tāva kumbhasatampi kumbhasahassampi vihāraṃ pesenti, ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā therāsanato
analyzed: sappissa tāva kumbha satam pi kumbha sahassam pi vihāram pesenti ghaṇṭim paharitvā thera āsanataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya gahitabhājanaṃ pūretvā dātabbaṃ, piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. Sace alasajātikā
analyzed: paṭṭhāya gahita bhājanam pūretvā dātabbam piṇḍapātikānam pi vaṭṭati sace alasa jātikā

analyzed: mahā therā pacchā āgacchanti bhante vīsati vassānam diyyati tumhākam ṭhitikā atikkantā ati

original: na vattabbā, ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: na vattabbā ṭhitikam ṭhapetvā tesam datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbam

original: “Asukavihāre bahu sappi uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantaravihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
analyzed: asuka vihāre bahu sappi uppannanti sutvā yojana antara vihārataḥ pi bhikkhū āgacchanti

original: sampattasampattānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ. Asampattānampi upacārasīmaṃ
analyzed: sampatta sampattānam ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ paṭṭhāya dātabbam a sampattānam pi upacāra sīmam

original: paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu dātabbameva. “Bahiupacārasīmāya ṭhitānaṃ dethā”ti
analyzed: paviṭṭhānam antevāsika ādīsu gaṇhantesu dātabbam eva bahi upacāra sīmāya ṭhitānam detha iti

original: vadanti, na dātabbaṃ. Sace pana upacārasīmaṃ okkantehi ekābaddhā hutvā attano vihāradvāre
analyzed: vadanti na dātabbam sace pana upacāra sīmam okkantehi eka ābaddhāḥ hutvā attanaḥ vihāra dvāre

original: vā antovihāreyeva vā honti, parisāvasena vaḍḍhitā nāma sīmā hoti, tasmā dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā vā antovihāreya iva vā honti parisā vasena vaḍḍhitā nāma sīmā hoti tasmai dātabbam

original: Saṅghanavakassa dinnepi pacchā āgatānaṃ dātabbameva. Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ
analyzed: saṅgha navakassa dinne pi pacchā āgatānam dātabbam eva dutiya bhāge pana thera āsanam

original: āruḷhe pacchā āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti, dutiyabhāgato vassaggena dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: āruḷhe pacchā āgatānam paṭhama bhāgaḥ na pāpuṇāti dutiya bhāgataḥ vassaggena dātabbam

original: Upacārasīmaṃ pavisitvā yattha katthaci dinnaṃ hoti, sabbasannipātaṭṭhāneyeva bhājetabbaṃ.
analyzed: upacāra sīmam pavisitvā yattha katthaci dinnam hoti sabba sannipāta ṭṭhāneya iva bhājetabbam

original: Yasmiṃ vihāre dasa bhikkhū, daseva ca sappikumbhā diyyanti, ekekakumbhavaseneva bhājetabbaṃ.
analyzed: yasmin vihāre dasa bhikkhū dasa iva ca sappi kumbhāḥ diyyanti ekeka kumbha vasena iva bhājetabbam

original: Eko sappikumbho hoti, dasa bhikkhūhi bhājetvā gahetabbaṃ. Sace yathāṭhitaṃyeva “amhākaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ sappi kumbhaḥ hoti dasa bhikkhūhi bhājetvā gahetabbam sace yathā ṭhitam yeva amhākam

original: pāpuṇātī”ti gaṇhanti, duggahitaṃ; gatagataṭṭhāne saṅghikameva hoti. Kumbhaṃ pana
analyzed: pāpuṇāti iti gaṇhanti duggahitam gata gata ṭṭhāne saṅghikam eva hoti kumbham pana

original: āvajjetvā thālake thokaṃ sappiṃ katvā “idaṃ mahātherassa pāpuṇāti, avasesaṃ amhākaṃ
analyzed: āvajjetvā thālake thokam sappim katvā idam mahā therassa pāpuṇāti avasesam amhākam

original: pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā tampi kumbheyeva ākiritvā yathicchitaṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti iti vatvā ākiritvā yathicchitam gahetvā gantum vaṭṭati

original: Sace thinaṃ sappi hoti, lekhaṃ katvā “lekhato parabhāgo mahātherassa pāpuṇāti, avasesaṃ
analyzed: sace thinam sappi hoti lekham katvā lekhataḥ parabhāgaḥ mahā therassa pāpuṇāti avasesam

original: amhāka”nti gahitampi suggahitaṃ, vuttaparicchedato ūnādhikesupi bhikkhūsu ca sappikumbhesu
analyzed: amhākam ti gahitam pi su gahitam vutta paricchedato ūna adhikesu pi bhikkhūsu ca sappi kumbhesu

original: ca etenevupāyena bhājetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca etena iva upāyena bhājetabbam

original: Sace paneko bhikkhu, ekopi kumbho hoti, ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”tipi
analyzed: sace pana ekaḥ bhikkhu ekaḥ api kumbhaḥ hoti ghaṇṭim paharitvā ayam mayham pāpuṇāti iti pi

original: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Ayaṃ paṭhamabhāgo mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ dutiyabhāgo”ti evaṃ thokaṃ
analyzed: gahetum vaṭṭati ayam paṭhama bhāgaḥ mayham pāpuṇāti ayam dutiya bhāgaḥ iti evam thokam

original: thokampi pāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo navanītādīsupi. Yasmiṃ pana vippasanne tilatelādimhi
analyzed: thokam pi pāpetum vaṭṭati esa nayaḥ navanīta ādīsu pi yasmim pana vippasanne tila tela ādimhi

original: lekhā na santiṭṭhati, taṃ uddharitvā bhājetabbaṃ. Siṅgiveramaricādibhesajjampi avasesapattathālakādisamaṇaparikkhāropi
analyzed: lekhā na santiṭṭhati tam uddharitvā bhājetabbam siṅgivera marica ādi bhesajjam pi avasesa patta thālaka ādi samaṇa parikkhāro pi

original: sabbo vuttānurūpeneva nayena suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā bhājetabboti.
analyzed: sabbaḥ vutta anurūpena iva nayena suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā bhājetabbaḥ ti

original: Pāḷiṃ aṭṭhakathañceva, oloketvā vicakkhaṇo;
analyzed: pāḷim aṭṭhakatham ca iva oloketvā vicakkhaṇaḥ

original: Saṅghike paccaye evaṃ, appamattova bhājayeti.
analyzed: saṅghike paccaye evam appamattaḥ uva bhājayeti

original: Iti sabbākārena paccayabhājanīyakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: iti sabba ākārena paccaya bhājanīya kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Sammannitvā ṭhapitayāgubhājakādīhi bhājanīyaṭṭhānaṃ āgatamanussānaṃ anāpucchitvāva
analyzed: sammannitvā ṭhapita yāgu bhājaka ādīhi bhājanīya ṭhānam āgata manussānam an āpucchitvā ava

original: upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo, asammatehi pana apaloketvā dātabbo. Sammatena appamattakavissajjanakena
analyzed: upaḍḍha bhāgaḥ dātabbaḥ asammatehi pana apaloketvā dātabbaḥ sammatena appamattaka vissajjanakena

original: bhikkhunā cīvarakammaṃ karontassa “sūciṃ dehī”ti vadato ekā dīghā, ekā rassāti dve
analyzed: bhikkhunā cīvara kammam karontassa sūcim dehi iti vadataḥ ekā dīghā ekā rassā ati dve

original: sūciyo dātabbā. “Avibhattaṃ saṅghikaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthi. Pipphalakatthikassa
analyzed: sūciyaḥ dātabbāḥ a vibhattam saṅghikam bhaṇḍanti pucchitabba kiccam natthi pipphalakatthikassa

original: eko pipphalako, addhānakantāraṃ paṭipajjitukāmassa upāhanayugaḷaṃ, kāyabandhanatthikassa
analyzed: ekaḥ pipphalakaḥ addhāna kantāram paṭipajjitu kāmassa upāhana yugaḷam kāya bandhana atthikassa

original: kāyabandhanaṃ, “aṃsabaddhako me jiṇṇo”ti āgatassa aṃsabaddhako, parissāvanatthikassa
analyzed: kāyabandhanam aṃsa baddhakaḥ me jiṇṇaḥ ti āgatassa aṃsa baddhakaḥ parissāvanatthikassa

original: parissāvanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Dhammakaraṇatthikassa dhammakaraṇo. Sace paṭako na hoti, dhammakaraṇo
analyzed: parissāvanam dātabbam dhamma karaṇatthikassa dhamma karaṇaḥ sace paṭakaḥ na hoti dhamma karaṇaḥ

original: paṭakena saddhiṃ dātabbo. “Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ āropessāmī”ti yācantassa kusiyā ca aḍḍhakusiyā
analyzed: paṭakena saddhim dātabbaḥ āgantuka paṭṭam āropessāmi iti yācantassa kusiyā ca aḍḍhakusiyā

original: ca pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ. “Maṇḍalaṃ nappahotī”ti āgatassa maṇḍalaṃ ekaṃ dātabbaṃ, aḍḍhamaṇḍalāni
analyzed: ca pahonakam dātabbam maṇḍalam na pahoti iti āgatassa maṇḍalam ekam dātabbam aḍḍha maṇḍalāni

original: dve dātabbāni. Dve maṇḍalāni yācantassa na dātabbāni. Anuvātaparibhaṇḍatthikassa
analyzed: dve dātabbāni dve maṇḍalāni yācantassa na dātabbāni anuvāta paribhaṇḍatthikassa

original: ekassa cīvarassa pahonakaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sappinavanītādiatthikassa gilānassa ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ
analyzed: ekassa cīvarassa pahonakam dātabbam sappi navanīta ādi atthikassa gilānassa ekam bhesajjam

original: nāḷimattaṃ katvā tato tatiyakoṭṭhāso dātabbo. Evaṃ tīṇi divasāni datvā nāḷiyā paripuṇṇāya
analyzed: nāḷi mattam katvā tatas tatiya koṭṭhāsaḥ dātabbo evam tīṇi divasāni da tvā nāḷiyā paripuṇṇāya

original: catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya saṅghaṃ pucchitvā dātabbaṃ. Guḷapiṇḍepi ekadivasaṃ tatiyabhāgo
analyzed: catuttha divasataḥ paṭṭhāya saṅgham pucchitvā dātabbam guḷa piṇḍe pi eka divasam tatiya bhāgaḥ

original: dātabbo. Evaṃ tīhi divasehi niṭṭhite piṇḍe tato paraṃ saṅghaṃ pucchitvā dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: dātabbaḥ evam tīhi divasehi niṭṭhite piṇḍe tato param saṅgham pucchitvā dātabbam

original: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Pakkhikabhattādikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pakkhika bhatta ādi kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: senāsana khandhaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Saṅghabhedakakkhandhakaṃ
analyzed: saṅgha bhedaka khandhakam

original: Chasakyapabbajjākathā
analyzed: cha sakya pabbajjā kathā

original: 330. Saṅghabhedakakkhandhake abhiññātā abhiññātāti pākaṭā pākaṭā. Sakyakumārā nāma
analyzed: saṅghabhedaka khandhake abhiññātā abhiññātā ati pākaṭā pākaṭā sakyakumārā nāma

original: kāḷudāyippabhutayo dasa dūtā saddhiṃ parivārehi aññe ca bahū janā. Amhākanti amhesu;
analyzed: dasa dūtā saddhim parivārehi aññe ca bahū janā amhākanti amhesu

original: amhākaṃ kulatoti vā vuttaṃ hoti. Gharāvāsatthaṃ anusāsissāmīti gharāvāse yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
analyzed: amhākam kulato ti vā vuttam hoti ghara āvāsa attham anusāsissāmi iti ghara āvāse yam kattabbam

original: taṃ jānāpessāmi. Udakaṃ ninnetabbanti yathā udakaṃ sabbaṭṭhāne samaṃ hoti, evaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam jānāpessāmi udakam ninnetabbanti yathā udakam sabba ṭṭhāne samam hoti evam kātabbam

original: Niddhāpetabbanti tiṇāni uddharitabbāni. Bhusikā uddharāpetabbāti sukhumapalālamissadhaññā
analyzed: niddhāpetabbanti tiṇāni uddharitabbāni bhusikā uddharāpetabbā ati sukhuma palāla missa dhaññā

original: palālikā palāpetabbā. Opunāpetabbanti sukhumapalālaṃ apanetabbaṃ. Tvaññeva gharāvāsatthena
analyzed: palālikā palāpetabbā opunāpetabbanti sukhuma palālam apanetabbam tvañc eva ghara āvāsatthena

original: upajānāhīti tvaññeva gharāvāsatthaṃ jānāhi. Ahaṃ tayā yathāsukhaṃ pabbajāhīti ettha
analyzed: upajānāhi iti tvañc eva ghara āvāsattham jānāhi aham tayā yathāsukham pabbajāhi iti ettha

original: ahaṃ tayā saddhiṃ pabbajissāmīti sahāyasinehena sahasā vattukāmo hutvā puna rajjasirilobhena
analyzed: aham tayā saddhim pabbajissāmi iti sahāya sinehena sahasā vattu kāmaḥ hutvā punar rajja siri lobhena

original: parikaḍḍhiyamānahadayo “ahaṃ tayā”ti ettakameva vatvā sesaṃ vattuṃ nāsakkhīti evamattho veditabbo.
analyzed: parikaḍḍhiyamāna hadayaḥ aham tayā iti ettakam eva vatvā sesam vattum na asakkhi iti evam atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 331. Nippātitāti nikkhamitā. Mānassinoti mānassayino; mānanissitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nippātitā ati nikkhamitā mānassinaḥ ti māna ssayinaḥ māna nissitā ati vuttam hoti

original: 332. Yassantarato na santi kopāti tatiyamaggena samūhatattā yassa citte kopā na santi.
analyzed: yassa antarataḥ na santi kopā ati tatiya maggena yassa citte kopāḥ na santi

original: Yasmā pana bhavoti sampatti, vibhavoti vipatti; tathā bhavoti vuḍḍhi, vibhavoti hāni;
analyzed: yasmai pana bhavoti sampatti vibhavoti vipatti tathā bhavoti vuḍḍhi vibhavoti hāni

original: bhavoti sassataṃ, vibhavoti ucchedo; bhavoti puññaṃ, vibhavoti pāpaṃ; vibhavoti ca
analyzed: bhavoti sassatam vibhavoti ucchedaḥ bhavoti puññam vibhavoti pāpam vibhavoti ca

original: abhavoti ca atthato ekameva, tasmā itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti ettha yā esā sampattivipattivuḍḍhihānisassatucchedapuññapāpavasena
analyzed: ca atthataḥ ekam eva tasmai iti bhava abhavatam ca ettha yā esā sampatti vipatti vuḍḍhi hāni sassatu cheda puñña pāpa vasena

original: iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati; catūhipi maggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena
analyzed: iti aneka ppakārā bhava abhava tā vuccati catūhi pi maggehi yathāsambhavam tena tena

original: nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Nānubhavantīti na
analyzed: nayena tam iti bhava abhava tam ca evamatthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ na anubhavanti iti na

original: sampāpuṇanti; tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: sampāpuṇanti tassa dassanam devānam pi dullabhanti adhippāyaḥ

original: 333. Ahimekhalikāti ahiṃ kaṭiyaṃ bandhitvā. Ucchaṅgeti aṅke.
analyzed: ahimekhalikā ati ahim kaṭiyam bandhitvā ucchaṅgā iti aṅke

original: 334. Sammannatīti sammāneti. Yaṃ tumo karissatīti yaṃ so karissati.
analyzed: sammannati iti sammāneti yam tumo karissati iti yam saḥ karissati

original: Chasakyapabbajjākathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: cha sakya pabbajjā kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Pakāsanīyakammādikathā
analyzed: pakāsanīya kamma ādi kathā

original: 336. Kheḷāsakassāti ettha micchājīvena uppannapaccayā ariyehi vantabbā kheḷasadisā, tathārūpe paccaye ayaṃ ajjhoharatīti katvā kheḷāsakoti bhagavatā vutto.
analyzed: kheḷāsakassa ati ettha micchājīvena uppanna paccayā ariyehi vantabbā kheḷa sadisā tathārūpe paccaye ayam ajjhoharati iti katvā kheḷāsakaḥ iti bhagavatā vuttaḥ

original: 340. Patthaddhena kāyenāti potthakarūpasadisena niccalena kāyena.
analyzed: patthaddhena kāyena ati potthaka rūpa sadisena niccalena kāyena

original: 342. Mayaṃ kho bhaṇe rājañātakā nāmāti rājā amhe jānātīti rājañātakassa bhāvena attānaṃ ukkaṃsanto āha. Pahaṭṭhakaṇṇavāloti bandhane niccale katvā.

original: Dukkhañhi kuñjara nāgamāsadoti bho kuñjara buddhanāgaṃ āsādanaṃ vadhakacittena upagamanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ. Nāgahatassāti buddhanāgaṃ ghātakassa.

original: Paṭikuṭiyova osakkīti tathāgatābhimukhoyeva piṭṭhimehi pādehi avasakki. Alakkhikoti
analyzed: paṭikuṭiyā uva osakkī iti tathāgata abhimukhaḥ yā iva piṭṭhimehi pādehi avasakkī alakkhiko ti

original: Na lakkhitabboti vā alakkhiko; na passitabboti attho.

original: 343. Tikabhojananti ettha tīhi janehi bhuñjitabbabhojanaṃ. Taṃ paññāpessāmīti taṃ

original: vuttā. Kappanti āyukappaṃ. Brahmaṃ puññanti seṭṭhaṃ puññaṃ. Kappaṃ saggamhīti āyukappameva.

original: Saṅghabhedakakathā
analyzed: saṅgha bhedaka kathā

original: 344. Atha kho devadatto saṅghaṃ bhinditvāti so kira evaṃ salākaṃ gāhetvā tattheva āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ katvā gato, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: atha kho devadattaḥ saṅgham bhinditvā ati saḥ kira evam salākam gāhetvā tattha iva āveṇikam uposatham katvā gataḥ tena itam vuttaṃ

original: 347. Sutāti sotā. Asandiddho ca akkhātīti nissandeho hutvā akkhāti anusandhivasena yojetvā yojetvā.

original: saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana kammavibhaṅge vakkhāma.

original: Obhāsentīti asaddhammena obhāsenti. Bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojentīti bhikkhunīhi
analyzed: obhāsenti iti asat dhammena obhāsenti bhikkhunīhi saddhim sampayojenti iti bhikkhunīhi

original: saddhiṃ purise asaddhammena sampayojenti. Avandiyakaraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. Āvaraṇanti
analyzed: saddhim purise asat dhammena sampayojenti a vandiya karaṇam vutta nayam eva

original: vihārappavesane nivāraṇaṃ. Ovādaṃ ṭhapetunti ettha na bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: vihāra ppavesane nivāraṇam ovādam ṭhapetunti ettha na bhikkhun upassayam gantvā ṭhapetabbaḥ

original: Ovādatthāya pana āgatā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “asukā nāma bhikkhunī sāpattikā, tassā
analyzed: ovāda atthāya pana āgatāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ vattabbāḥ asukā nāma bhikkhunī sāpattikā tassā

original: ovādaṃ ṭhapemi, mā tāya saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karitthā”ti. Kāyavivaraṇādīsupi daṇḍakammaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: ovādam ṭhapemi mā tāya saddhim uposatham karittha ati kāya vivaraṇa ādīsu pi daṇḍa kammam vutta nayam eva

original: 413. Na bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā ovādo na gantabbotiādi bhikkhunivibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
analyzed: na bhikkhave bhikkhuniyāḥ ovādaḥ na gantabbaḥ ti ādi bhikkhuni vibhaṅga vaṇṇanāyam vuttam eva

original: 416. Phāsukā namentīti gihidārikāyo viya ghanapaṭṭakena kāyabandhanena phāsukā namanatthāya bandhanti. Ekapariyākatanti ekavāraṃ parikkhipanakaṃ.
analyzed: phāsukāḥ namenti iti gihi dārikāyaḥ viya ghana paṭṭakena kāyabandhanena phāsukāḥ namana atthāya bandhanti eka pariyākatam ti eka vāram parikkhipanakam

original: Vilīvena paṭṭenāti saṇhehi veḷuvilīvehi katapaṭṭena. Dussapaṭṭenāti setavatthapaṭṭena.
analyzed: vilīvena paṭṭena ati saṇhehi veḷu vilīvehi kata paṭṭena dussa paṭṭena ati setavattha paṭṭena

original: Dussaveṇiyāti dussena kataveṇiyā. Dussavaṭṭiyāti dussena katavaṭṭiyā. Coḷapaṭṭādīsu
analyzed: dussa veṇiyā ati dussena kata veṇiyā dussa vaṭṭiyā ati dussena kata vaṭṭiyā coḷa paṭṭa ādīsu

original: coḷakāsāvaṃ coḷanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: coḷaka āsāvam coḷanti veditabbam

original: Aṭṭhillenāti gojaṅghaṭṭhikena. Jaghananti kaṭippadeso vuccati. Hatthaṃ koṭṭāpentīti
analyzed: aṭṭhillena ati gojaṅghaṭṭhikena jaghanam ti kaṭi ppadesaḥ vuccati hattham koṭṭāpenti iti

original: aggabāhaṃ koṭṭāpetvā morapattādīhi cittālaṅkāraṃ karonti. Hatthakocchanti piṭṭhihatthaṃ.
analyzed: agga bāham koṭṭāpetvā mora patta ādīhi citta alaṅkāram karonti piṭṭhi hattham

original: Pādanti jaṅghaṃ. Pādakocchanti piṭṭhipādaṃ.
analyzed: jaṅgham piṭṭhi pādam

original: 417. Mukhalimpanādīni vuttanayāneva. Avaṅgaṃ karontīti akkhī añjantiyo avaṅgadese
analyzed: mukha limpana ādīni vutta nayāni eva avaṅgam karonti iti akkhī añjantiyaḥ avaṅga dese

original: adhomukhaṃ lekhaṃ karonti. Visesakanti gaṇḍappadese vicitrasaṇṭhānaṃ visesakaṃ karonti.
analyzed: adhomukham lekham karonti visesakanti gaṇḍa ppadese vicitra saṇṭhānam visesakam karonti

original: Olokentīti vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vīthiṃ olokenti. Sāloke tiṭṭhantīti dvāraṃ vivaritvā
analyzed: olokenti iti vāta pānam vivaritvā vīthim olokenti sa āloke tiṭṭhanti iti dvāram vivaritvā

original: upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassentiyo tiṭṭhanti. Naccanti naṭasamajjaṃ kārenti. Vesiṃ vuṭṭhāpentīti
analyzed: upaḍḍhakāyam dassentiyaḥ tiṭṭhanti naccanti naṭa samajjam kārenti vesim vuṭṭhāpenti iti

original: gaṇikaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti. Pānāgāraṃ ṭhapentīti suraṃ vikkiṇanti. Sūnaṃ ṭhapentīti maṃsaṃ
analyzed: gaṇikam vuṭṭhāpenti pānāgāram ṭhapenti iti suram vikkiṇanti sūnam ṭhapenti iti maṃsam

original: vikkiṇanti. Āpaṇanti nānābhaṇḍānaṃ anekavidhaṃ āpaṇaṃ pasārenti. Dāsaṃ upaṭṭhāpentīti
analyzed: vikkiṇanti āpaṇanti nānā bhaṇḍānam anekavidham āpaṇam pasārenti dāsam upaṭṭhāpenti iti

original: dāsaṃ gahetvā tena attano veyyāvaccaṃ kārenti. Dāsīādīsupi eseva nayo. Haritakapakkikaṃ
analyzed: dāsam gahetvā tena attanaḥ veyyāvaccam kārenti dāsī ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ haritaka pakkikam

original: pakiṇantīti haritakañceva pakkañca pakiṇanti; pakiṇṇakāpaṇaṃ pasārentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pakiṇanti iti haritakam ca iva pakkam ca pakiṇanti pakiṇṇa kāpaṇam pasārenti iti vuttam hoti

original: 418. Sabbanīlakādikathā kathitāyeva.
analyzed: sabba nīlaka ādi kathā kathitāya iva

original: 419. Bhikkhunī ce, bhikkhave, kālaṃ karontītiādīsu ayaṃ pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – sace
analyzed: bhikkhunī ce bhikkhave kālam karonti iti ādīsu ayam pāḷimuttaka vinicchayaḥ sace

original: hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto “mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro upajjhāyassa
analyzed: hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yaḥ koci kālam karontaḥ mamaccayena mayham parikkhāraḥ upajjhāyassa

original: hotu, ācariyassa hotu, saddhivihārikassa hotu, antevāsikassa hotu, mātu hotu, pitu
analyzed: hotu ācariyassa hotu saddhivihārikassa hotu antevāsikassa hotu mātu hotu pitu

original: hotu, aññassa vā yassa kassaci hotū”ti vadati tesaṃ na hoti, saṅghasseva hoti. Na
analyzed: hotu aññassa vā yassa kassaci hotu uti vadati tesam na hoti saṅghassa iva hoti na

original: hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati, gihīnaṃ pana ruhati. Bhikkhu hi
analyzed: hi pañcannam sahadhammikānam accaya dānam ruhati gihīnam pana ruhati bhikkhu hi

original: bhikkhunivihāre kālaṃ karoti, tassa parikkhāro bhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti. Bhikkhunī bhikkhuvihāre
analyzed: bhikkhuni vihāre kālam karoti tassa parikkhāraḥ bhikkhūnam yeva hoti bhikkhunī bhikkhu vihāre

original: kālaṃ karoti, tassā parikkhāro bhikkhunīnaṃyeva hoti.
analyzed: kālam karoti tassāḥ parikkhāraḥ bhikkhunīnam yeva hoti

original: 420. Purāṇamallīti purāṇe gihikāle mallakassa bhariyā. Purisabyañjananti purisanimittaṃ,
analyzed: purāṇa mallī iti purāṇe gihi kāle mallakassa bhariyā purisa byañjanam ti purisa nimittam

original: chinnaṃ vā hotu acchinnaṃ vā, paṭicchannaṃ vā appaṭicchannaṃ vā. Sace etasmiṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: chinnam vā hotu a chinnam vā paṭicchannam vā appaṭicchannam vā sace etasmin ṭhāne

original: purisabyañjananti cittaṃ uppādetvā upanijjhāyati, dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: cittam uppādetvā upanijjhāyati dukkaṭam

original: 421. Attano paribhogatthāya dinnaṃ nāma yaṃ “tumheyeva paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ,
analyzed: attano paribhoga tthāya dinnam nāma yam tumheya iva paribhuñjatha ati vatvā dinnam

original: taṃ aññassa dadato dukkaṭaṃ. Aggaṃ gahetvā pana dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace asappāyaṃ, sabbaṃ
analyzed: tam aññassa dadataḥ dukkaṭam aggam gahetvā pana dātum vaṭṭati sace asappāyam sabbam

original: apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Cīvaraṃ ekāhaṃ vā dvīhaṃ vā paribhuñjitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pattādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: apanetum vaṭṭati cīvaram eka aham vā dvi iham vā paribhuñjitvā dātum vaṭṭati patta ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ

original: Bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvāti hiyyo paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitamaṃsaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhūnam sannidhim bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā ati hiyyo paṭiggahetvā ṭhapita maṃsam

original: ajja aññasmiṃ anupasampanne asati bhikkhūhi paṭiggāhāpetvā bhikkhunīhi paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: ajja aññasmin an upasampanne asati bhikkhūhi paṭiggāhāpetvā bhikkhunīhi paribhuñjitabbam

original: Bhikkhūhi paṭiggahitañhi bhikkhunīnaṃ appaṭiggahitakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, bhikkhunīnaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhūhi paṭiggahitam hi bhikkhunīnam a paṭiggahitaka ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati bhikkhunīnam

original: paṭiggahitampi bhikkhūsu eseva nayo.
analyzed: paṭiggahitam pi bhikkhūsu esa iva nayo

original: 426. Āsanaṃ saṃkasāyantiyo kālaṃ vītināmesunti aññaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā aññaṃ nisīdāpentiyo bhojanakālaṃ atikkāmesuṃ.
analyzed: āsanam saṃkasāyantiyaḥ kālam vītināmesunti aññam vuṭṭhāpetvā aññam nisīdāpentiyaḥ bhojana kālam atikkāmesuṃ

original: Aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yathāvuḍḍhanti ettha sace pure aṭṭhasu nisinnāsu tāsaṃ abbhantarimā
analyzed: aṭṭhannam bhikkhunīnam ettha sace pure aṭṭhasu nisinnāsu tāsam abbhantarimā

original: aññā āgacchati, sā attano navakaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā nisīdituṃ labhati. Yā pana aṭṭhahipi
analyzed: aññā āgacchati sā attanaḥ navakam uṭṭhāpetvā nisīditum labhati yā pana

original: navakatarā, sā sacepi saṭṭhivassā hoti, āgatapaṭipāṭiyāva nisīdituṃ labhati. Aññattha
analyzed: navakatarā sā sace pi saṭṭhivassā hoti āgata paṭipāṭiyā āva nisīditum labhati aññattha

original: sabbattha yathāvuḍḍhaṃ na paṭibāhitabbanti ṭhapetvā bhattaggaṃ aññasmiṃ catupaccayabhājanīyaṭṭhāne
analyzed: sabbattha yathāvuḍḍham na paṭibāhitabbanti ṭhapetvā bhattaggam aññasmim catu paccaya bhājanīya ṭṭhāne

original: “ahaṃ pubbe āgatā”ti vuḍḍhaṃ paṭibāhitvā kiñci na gahetabbaṃ; yathāvuḍḍhameva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: aham pubbe āgatā ati vuḍḍham paṭibāhitvā kiñci na gahetabbam yathāvuḍḍham eva vaṭṭati

original: Pavāraṇākathā kathitāyeva.
analyzed: pavāraṇā kathā kathitāya iva

original: 429. Itthiyuttantiādīhi sabbayānāni anuññātāni. Pāṭaṅkinti paṭapoṭṭalikaṃ.
analyzed: itthi yutta nti ādīhi sabba yānāni anuññātāni pāṭaṅkinti paṭa poṭṭalikam

original: 430. Dūtena upasampadā dasannaṃ antarāyānaṃ yena kenaci vaṭṭati. Kammavācāpariyosāne
analyzed: dūtena upasampadā antarāyānam yena kenaci vaṭṭati kamma vācā pariyosāne

original: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunupassaye ṭhitā vā hotu nipannā vā jāgarā vā niddaṃ okkantā vā,
analyzed: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunu passaye ṭhitā vā hotu nipannā vā jāgarā vā niddam okkantā vā

original: upasampannāva hoti. Tāvadeva chāyādīni āgatāya dūtabhikkhuniyā ācikkhitabbāni.
analyzed: upasampannā ava hoti tāvat eva chāyā ādīni āgatāya dūta bhikkhuniyā ācikkhitabbāni

original: 431. Udositoti bhaṇḍasālā. Na sammatīti nappahoti. Upassayanti gharaṃ. Navakammanti saṅghassatthāya bhikkhuniyā navakammampi kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
analyzed: udosito ti bhaṇḍasālā na sammatīti nappahoti upassayanti gharam nava kammanti saṅghassa atthāya bhikkhuniyāḥ nava kammam pi kātum anujānāmi iti attho

original: 432. Tassā pabbajitāyāti tassā pabbajitakāle. Yāva so dārako viññutaṃ pāpuṇātīti yāva khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ nahāyituñca maṇḍituñca attano dhammatāya sakkotīti attho.
analyzed: tassā pabbajitāya ati tassā pabbajita kāle yāva saḥ dārakaḥ viññu tam pāpuṇāti iti yāva khāditum bhuñjitum nahāyitum ca maṇḍitum ca attanaḥ dhamma tāya sakkoti iti attho

original: Ṭhapetvā sāgāranti sahagāraseyyamattaṃ ṭhapetvā. Yathā aññasmiṃ purise; evaṃ dutiyikāya
analyzed: ṭhapetvā sahagāraseyya mattam ṭhapetvā yathā aññasmin purise evam dutiyikāya

original: bhikkhuniyā tasmiṃ dārake paṭipajjitabbanti dasseti. Mātā pana nahāpetuṃ pāyetuṃ
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā tasmin dārake paṭipajjitabbanti dasseti mātā pana nahāpetum pāyetum

original: bhojetuṃ maṇḍetuṃ ure katvā sayituñca labhati.
analyzed: bhojetum maṇḍetum ure katvā sayitum ca labhati

original: 434. Yadeva sā vibbhantāti yasmā sā vibbhantā attano ruciyā khantiyā odātāni vatthāni
analyzed: yat eva sā vibbhantā ati yasmai sā vibbhantā attanaḥ ruciyā khantiyā odātāni vatthāni

original: nivatthā, tasmāyeva sā abhikkhunī, na sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti dasseti. Sā puna upasampadaṃ na labhati.
analyzed: nivatthā sā abhikkhunī na sikkhā paccakkhānena ati dasseti sā puna upasampadam na labhati

original: Sā āgatā na upasampādetabbāti na kevalaṃ na upasampādetabbā, pabbajjampi na labhati. Odātāni gahetvā vibbhantā pana pabbajjāmattaṃ labhati.
analyzed: sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā ati na kevalam na upasampādetabbā pabbajjam pi na labhati odātāni gahetvā vibbhantā pana pabbajjā mattam labhati

original: Abhivādanantiādīsu purisā pāde sambāhantā vandanti, kese chindanti, nakhe chindanti,
analyzed: purisā pāde sambāhantā vandanti kese chindanti nakhe chindanti

original: vaṇapaṭikammaṃ karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ kukkuccāyantā na sādiyantīti attho. Tatreke ācariyā
analyzed: vaṇa paṭikammam karonti tat sabbam kukkuccāyantā na sādiyanti iti tatra eke ācariyā

original: “sace ekato vā ubhato vā avassutā honti sārattā, yathāvatthukameva”. Eke ācariyā
analyzed: sace ekatas vā ubhatas vā avassutāḥ honti sārattāḥ yathāvatthukam eva eke ācariyā

original: “natthi ettha āpattī”ti vadanti. Evaṃ ācariyavādaṃ dassetvā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ
analyzed: natthi ettha āpatti iti vadanti evam ācariya vādam dassetvā idam odissa anuññātam

original: vaṭṭatīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave sāditu”nti hi vacaneneva taṃ kappiyaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttam tam pamāṇam anujānāmi bhikkhave sāditun ti hi vacanena iva tam kappiyam

original: 435. Pallaṅkena nisīdantīti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdanti. Aḍḍhapallaṅkanti ekaṃ
analyzed: pallaṅkena nisīdanti iti pallaṅkam ābhujitvā nisīdanti ekam

original: pādaṃ ābhujitvā katapallaṅkaṃ. Heṭṭhā vivaṭe upari paṭicchanneti ettha sace kūpo
analyzed: pādam ābhujitvā kata pallaṅkam heṭṭhā vivaṭe upari paṭicchannā iti ettha sace kūpaḥ

original: khato hoti, upari pana padaramattameva sabbadisāsu paññāyati, evarūpepi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: khataḥ hoti upari pana padara mattam eva sabba disāsu paññāyati evarūpe pi vaṭṭati

original: 436. Kukkusaṃ mattikanti kuṇḍakañceva mattikañca. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: kukkusam mattikanti kuṇḍakam ca iva mattikam ca sesam ettha uttānam eva ati

original: Bhikkhunīupasampadānujānanakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhikkhunī upasampadā anujānana kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Bhikkhunikkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhikkhunikkhandhaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 11. Pañcasatikakkhandhakaṃ
analyzed: pañcasatika khandhakam

original: Khuddānukhuddakasikkhāpadakathā
analyzed: khuddānukhuddaka sikkhāpada kathā

original: 441. Pañcasatikakkhandhake – cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakānīti
analyzed: pañcasatika khandhake cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khudda anukhuddakāni iti

original: evamādi ekasikkhāpadampi apariccajitvā sabbesaṃ saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanatthaṃ pariyāyena
analyzed: evamādi eka sikkhāpadam pi a pariccajitvā sabbesam saṅgahetabba bhāva dassana ttham pariyāyena

original: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vo samaṇānanti idaṃ samaṇānaṃ. Padapūraṇamatte vokāro.
analyzed: vuttam idam vaḥ samaṇānam ti idam samaṇānam pada pūraṇa matte vokāraḥ

original: 443. Idampi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭanti “idaṃ tayā duṭṭhu kata”nti kevalaṃ garahantehi
analyzed: idam pi te āvuso ānanda dukkaṭa nti idam tayā duṭṭhu kata nti kevalam gara hantehi

original: therehi vuttaṃ, na āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te āpattānāpattiṃ na jānanti. Idāneva
analyzed: therehi vuttam na āpattim sandhāya vuttam na hi te āpatta anāpattim na jānanti idānā iva

original: cetaṃ anussāvitaṃ – “saṅgho apaññattaṃ na paññapeti, paññattaṃ na samucchindatī”ti.
analyzed: cetam anussāvitam saṅghaḥ a paññattam na paññapeti paññattam na samucchindati iti

original: Desehi taṃ dukkaṭanti idampi ca “āma, bhante, duṭṭhu mayā kata”nti evaṃ paṭijānāhi,
analyzed: desehi tam dukkaṭanti idam pi ca āma bhante duṭṭhu mayā katanti evam paṭijānāhi

original: taṃ dukkaṭanti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na āpattidesanaṃ. Thero pana yasmā asatiyā na
analyzed: tat dukkaṭam ti idam sandhāya vuttam na āpatti desanam thero pana yasmai asatiyā na

original: pucchi na anādarena, tasmā tattha duṭṭhukatabhāvampi asallakkhento “nāhaṃ taṃ dukkaṭaṃ
analyzed: pucchi na anādarena tasmā tattha duṭṭhukata bhāvam pi a sallakkhentaḥ na aham tam dukkaṭam

original: passāmī”ti vatvā theresu gāravaṃ dassento “apicāyasmantānaṃ sandhāya desemi taṃ dukkaṭa”nti
analyzed: passāmi iti vatvā theresu gāravam dassentaḥ apica ayasmantānam sandhāya desemi tam dukkaṭam ti

original: āha. Yathā tumhe vadatha, tathā paṭijānāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Eseva nayo avasesesu catūsu
